5.content:
Honkai is a recurring cataclysm that comes in many forms, such as: Honkai Beasts, Herrschers, plagues, an ice age, diseases, etc. with the sole purpose of wiping out civilization. Honkai corresponds to the advancement of that civilization, meaning that the more it progresses, the more Honkai progresses as well. The force behind Honkai is the Will of Honkai.

In the larger scheme of things, Honkai is a form of natural selection, "pruning" weak worlds from the branches of the Imaginary Tree, to ensure that only strong worlds survive.

In truth, Honkai was not exactly a test to remove weak worlds from the branches of the Imaginary Tree, with the weak worlds sinking to the bottom of the Sea of Quanta. One interpretation of what Honkai is, given by Tesla and Kevin, is that Honkai is a "test" for humanity to evolve enough for the Finality to "embrace" through trial and error. In this context, "embrace" means that humanity and civilization assimilate into the Finality, which will then seek out other worlds in the Imaginary Tree and force other worlds to assimilate into it. Dr. MEI speculates that the Finality is some sort of higher being, a higher civilization, or a higher existence, though it has no tangible form. Instead, it projects itself as a "Cocoon" into the Honkai universe.

In Chapter 33, Kevin reveals to Fu Hua the truth about Earth's civilization and the truth of the Finality: The Finality's true power is time. Using its powers, the planet becomes trapped in a 50,000-year reincarnation time loop. After 50,000 years have passed and the "embrace" fails, the Final Herrscher will reset the world‚Äîand civilization‚Äîback to the beginning to try again.

Regarding bubble universes, in Chapter 32, Dr. MEI states that when the world is reset, the power of the Finality creates bubble universes based on the influence of the world it resets.

6.content:
The Imaginary Tree is an important place of Honkai Impact 3rd series. It is the origin of life itself, as all universes and bubble worlds are born there.

Summary
The Imaginary Tree emerged from Sea of Quanta. Since the Imaginary Tree and Sea Of Quanta are alone in the universe, they have an unending rivalry. The Sea Of Quanta swells while the Imaginary Tree extends its roots. The Sea Of Quanta wants to flood the Tree. Meanwhile, the Imaginary Tree wants to absorb the Sea.

The Tree has drank from the Sea, endured an asamkhya (innumerable amount of time), and grown a nayuta (numerical unit of one hundred billion or ten million) of branches and leaves. During this seemingly endless time, a branch grew a new bud. This was the birth of human civilization. Time flows in the trunk of the Imaginary Tree and branches out into an infinity of worlds. Every branch is a form of civilization, while every bud is their past and present etched onto the dimension of time. Each twig is a world line and each leaf is a bubble universe.

7.content:
The Sea of Quanta is a very important place in Honkai Impact 3rd series. It is the place where bubble universes reside and where several characters were sealed. The Sea of Quanta is where Quantum Shadows are born and produced.

Summary
From the moment, the Sea of Quanta birthed the Imaginary Tree, these two were the only living things in the multiverse, beginning a long rivalry. The Tree wishes to absorb the Sea, while the Sea wishes to drown the Tree. In order to facilitate this cycle, worlds "grow" as leaves of the Tree, and when they fail to persist, "fall" from the Tree and into the Sea. These worlds become fragmented versions of themselves, called bubble universes, with some having more stability than others.

More On Bubble Universes
The Sea of Quanta is a place that doesn't follow contemporary rules. Some people's memories are enough to create entirely new bubble universes, as was the case with the one Kevin Kaslana created to "teach" Seele Vollerei in Chapter 12, Plain of Vigrid. Some can be artificially created, such as the bubble universe Durandal and Rita visit. It was created by mankind in the Previous Era, and maintains stability through its Ether Anchor.

Ether Anchor
Simply put, an Ether Anchor is what tethers and holds a bubble universe together. It holds the world in place, but cannot do much to combat the lifespan of a bubble universe.

Sa
The entity who lives in the abyss of the Sea of Quanta, Sa is an omniscient being that destroys and consumes bubble universes.

Herrscher from Sea of Quanta
Herrscher born from the Sea, Herrscher independent of the Cocoon of Finality.

Herrscher from the Sea of Quanta: Herrscher of Rebirth

History
Planet Purusha
Millions of years ago, The civilization of planet Venus used the power from the Sea of Quanta to fight the Honkai. After the destruction of the planet, Vita ventured into the Sea of Quanta and evolved into Sa.

8.content:
The Honkai: A Cosmic Force

The Honkai is a cosmic force of nature that permeates the shared multiverse of Honkai Impact 3rd.
Honkai Energy is the primary byproduct of all Honkai manifestations across the universes. Sufficient concentrations of Honkai Energy radiation can cause various adverse effects on all living beings, particularly those with human intellect. While the required concentrations vary from person to person due to innate resistance to Honkai, a successful infection is referred to as Honkai Corruption.
Honkai as a Universal Energy System
Honkai Energy is used by all combatants in the universe and aids them in many ways. The section below explains how Honkai Energy qualifies as a Universal Energy System. And given its feats and mechanics, the following abilities are granted by default to any user: Energy Absorption, Stat Amplification, and Damage Increase.

Universal Usage

Honkai Energy is used by everything in the setting, from reactors, vehicles, mechs, and civilizations, to individuals who can freely manipulate it, be it Valkyries through their stigmas, MANTIS and Honkai beasts through the Honkai in their genes, and Herrschers through their cores and bodies filled with Honkai Energy. In addition, individuals with resistance to Honkai can also manipulate it.
It boosts all abilities, from battlesuits, weapons, and powers, some examples are: Honkai Energy being used to manipulate matter, Kiana/Sirin using Honkai Energy to cause spatial curvatures, Ana Schariac using Honkai Energy for her ice manipulation, Herrscher of Sentience's illusions releasing Honkai Energy, Honkai beasts using Honkai Energy to create acid storms.

Empowerment

Honkai Energy and its users have demonstrated several feats in terms of amplification, be it increasing the user's physique, speed, or abilities, both passively and actively.
Examples of passive strengthening are the enhancements received by Valkyries through their stigmata, making their body one of the best vessels for Honkai Energy, MANTIS through the genes of Honkai beasts increasing their strength and speed, with the strongest MANTIS as Flame-Chasers reaching Herrscher levels, with the latter also having Honkai Energy within their bodies.
It is also possible to absorb Honkai Energy, something noted as possible for all Valkyrie, to strengthen both one's physique and abilities in the process. Supplying more Honkai Energy causes enhanced resistances to be bypassed, and has also increased the potency of matter manipulation from atomic to subatomic. Additionally, Swara, the Edge of Taixuan, is capable of not only strengthening the body, but also launching attacks, and works by supplying more Honkai Energy. Honkai Energy also enhances battlesuits and melee weapons such as swords, which also empower the wielder in the process, or firearms such as pistols. Deterioration The reverse of the above is also true, with several demonstrations of users losing their strength, speed, failing to use their powers, and even dying. For starters, there is an anti-Honkai serum, which is capable of deactivating Honkai Energy; this serum was able to weaken a Honkai beast, resulting in its inability to control Honkai Energy, which caused its death. Valkyries also lost their ability to use Honkai, and were reduced to human levels of strength. Zombies went into a state of panic and rage, and even lost consciousness.
Losing or having less Honkai Energy causes the user to become slower, affecting both their travel speed, reaction speed, and attack speed, while a lack of Honkai Energy causes powers to fail.
The Nature of Honkai
The mechanisms and abilities by which Honkai Energy works and how it manifests in the world, which can be actively used depending on the user's Honkai adaptability. Honkai Energy innately possesses the following abilities:
* Information Manipulation (Type 2), Higher Dimensional Manipulation and Chaos Manipulation (Honkai is a force of chaos, its origin being a phenomenon that emanates from the Imaginary Space, capable of destabilizing it and having a strong interrelation with information, allowing it to increase and decrease the entropy of systems, which is described as informational asymmetries between chaotic and ordered information, expressing it through higher dimensional functions. Additionally, Honkai composes all the fundamental information of the Stigmata)
* Non-Physical Interaction (Spirits, Incorporeality, Memories, Dreams, Empathy, Limited Data, Abstract Thoughts, Information (Type 2), Concept (Type 1) and Non-existence (Nature Type 1); Can interact with Honkai Energy, as well as with Higokumaru, who is a spirit. Void Beings/Quantum States that are part of from the Sea of Quanta that exists as imaginary possibilities and concepts, the dreamscape, a blank space of nothingness and information that is said to be a higher-dimensional concept. They are also a projection of it, which are born from the cognition of emotions, desires, memories, and thoughts, as they are formless and non-corporeal, they are incapable of being harmed by any conventional real-world attack. Furthermore, Honkai energy can also interact with Stigma spaces, being the same as the Imaginary Space, a realm that is absolute nothingness, a void without any meaning or common sense, devoid of time being the opposite of reality; and affect the internal data of computers. Furthermore, it is stated that Honkai Energy is even more effective on non-physical entities than on physical ones)

Standard Effects

Honkai Energy causes corruption to everything it comes into contact with and brings about several negative effects just by its exposure and nature, which are listed below:

* Corruption (Types 1 and 2; Honkai is a corrupting force, capable of corrupting humans and animals, even Valkyries, inherently resistant to Honkai Energy due to their stigmas, can succumb to its influences. Corruption can spread by touching weapons energized with Honkai Energy, or through exposure and non-physical contact, the consequences of a successful infection are also diverse, ranging from victims transforming into a partial or even complete Honkai beast, creatures devoid of intelligence, driven solely by the instinct to gather under the command of the Herrschers. It can also induce zombification in individuals and, at its peak, transform them into Herrschers, being potent enough to impact even individuals like Kiana Kaslana, who through sheer force of will, mastered her Herrscher powers, powers that were effectively corroding her mind and even capable of possessing her, and yet her supernatural willpower was useless against Honkai infections. Honkai also has a corrupting effect on entities devoid of biological bodies, such as mechs or even those that lack a tangible physical form, such as the disembodied consciousness of the Herrscher of Sentience)
* Biological Manipulation, Empathic Manipulation, and Disease Manipulation (Lower levels of Honkai infection can cause brain damage, and infected areas become incapacitated, such as Bronya's leg, which required an exoskeleton prosthesis to function after the X-10 experiment. Said infection was able to affect her emotions, such as removing joy, sadness, emotional centers, and emotions in general. Honkai also acts like a disease, capable of transmission by mere exposure, causing multiple organ failure, such as acute heart failure, and has a 100% mortality rate despite medical efforts)
* Mental Manipulation, Soul Manipulation, Information Manipulation (Type 2), and Conceptual Manipulation (Type 1; Honkai Energy can control people by inducing mental corruption, infecting both the mind, their ego, and merging with the consciousness. Welt Yang was intrigued to realize that Bronya's mind was still human despite having corrupted her, and people who are corrupted to a certain degree Herrscher's characters also have to fight for their minds and bodies against the Herrscher persona. A person's mind is considered their soul and is composed of fundamental information, the latter of which shapes reality and life like a line of code, being conceptual in nature)
* Madness Manipulation (Types 1 and 2; Honkai Energy can drive people insane, compelling them to engage in aggressive behavior, including attacking each other. Kiana, having her mind corrupted and eroded by the Herrscher corruption, is described as breaking free from impending insanity upon releasing it; additionally, Honkai Energy also causes loss of sanity and sense of self)
* Corrosion Induction (Honkai is a phenomenon and condition that disintegrates and corrodes the composition of all materials, being able to induce corrosion in objects and erode structural integrity)
* Perception Manipulation (Honkai infections cause major sensory loss, impacting vision, causing blurriness and compromising visual clarity. Tesla, after being infected by Honkai Energy, also began to hallucinate)
* Energy Manipulation (Sufficient Honkai Energy can cause people to suffocate, vaporize, or even die upon contact)
* Necromancy (Honkai corruption has the ability to revive corpses as zombies)
* Life Manipulation (Honkai can corrode the life of a life form)
* Limited Memory Manipulation (Honkai infections are capable of causing memory loss and deterioration)
* Limited Pain Manipulation (Being injected with Honkai Energy induces pain and a burning sensation within the body)
* Limited Age Manipulation (Honkai has negative effects on lifespan, such as reduced lifespan and premature mortality)

Honkai Energy Manipulation
This section is dedicated to explaining and assigning the powers, abilities, scaling, and mastery of each user type. These abilities most often need to be actively used by the user. 

Low-Level Manipulation
Those with a resistance to Honkai Energy, such as Valkyries, most Blade Mantra users, Artificial Stigma users, and common MANTIS soldiers can exert some level of control over it when trained, granting them the use of its standard effects and a low level of manipulation over it.
Skills and Resistances
* Energy Absorption, Stat Amplification, and Damage Increase (Honkai Energy can be used and absorbed to strengthen and energize the body, increase the user's speed, enhance weapons such as pistols, swords, and armor, both passively, as in the natural enhancements received by Valkyries through the stigmata, incorporated into their own physiology and used since the Previous Era or MANTIS soldiers, and actively, as in the users of the Blade Mantra of the Taixuan Edge, in addition to the absorption of Honkai Energy, something that every Valkyrie can do, which is also capable of strengthening the user. More Honkai Energy also strengthens powers, Sirin previously could not send things to her dimension due to lack of energy, but after gaining more by absorbing the reactor and extra cores, she was able to not only send, but also create her dimension once again. Likewise, the Gem of Serenity, powered by additional Honkai Energy, was able to bypass the enhanced resistances of the Dr. Magi, and also allowed Seele to increase the level of her matter manipulation)
* Energy Manipulation (Honkai Energy empowers weapons, which if sufficiently contaminated, begin to radiate pure Honkai Energy, mechas, battlesuits, and abilities. Basic manipulation allows users to concentrate, restrict their energy to the smallest possible space, release powerful beams of Honkai Energy, or transfer their energy, allowing one to utilize the donor's energy and experience the power flowing and resonating within them, empowering Kiana's Gugnir enough to severely injure a clone of Joyce, even though Gugnir could not do so before without the boost)
* Life Manipulation (Honkai Energy can be used as food and was able to animate Fu Hua's sentience, which at the time was the feathers of Fenghuang Down, acting as a nucleus. Fu Hua could also absorb Hua's Honkai Energy to keep from fading away or dying, and releases of Honkai Energy are able to make plants grow)
* Limited Power Nullification (Honkai Energy can disable minor things like radars and satellite guidance, rendering them useless, and sensors passively. As well as actively, as applying Honkai Energy to seals caused them to be undone, seals that effectively expelled anyone who attempted to make contact with it)
High-Level Manipulation
Those with near-perfect or perfect resistance to Honkai Energy, such as Blade Mantra masters, Flame-Chasers, high-level Valkyries, true Stigma Awakeners, natural Stigma wielders, successful subjects of Experiment X-10, as well as Herrschers and Pseudo-Herrschers are able to manipulate Honkai Energy to a much greater extent, granting them the following abilities:
Abilities and Resistances
* Reality Warping, Spacetime Manipulation, Physics Manipulation, Law Manipulation, and BFR (High concentrations of Honkai Energy cause curvatures in spacetime, and with enough energy it is possible to warp spacetime itself and warp targets to the Sea of Quanta. This spacetime distortion effect caused by Honkai Energy is known as the "Reality Warping Field", as it influences and mutates all the physical rules of spacetime, causing all sorts of supernatural phenomena, such as parallel worlds and time reversals)
* Existence Erasure (Due to its users being able to BFR things to the Sea of Quanta, they have this ability by proxy, as the Sea of Quanta erases the existence of anything within it to the very information that composes it)
* Matter Manipulation (Subatomic), Transmutation, Quantum Manipulation (High-level manipulation of Honkai Energy allows the user to manipulate matter on a subatomic level, allowing them to change and manipulate the form of matter, and also cause quantization to instantly collapse one's physical integrity, effectively dematerializing the target, causing them to disappear into the unknown, losing and destabilizing their physical existence into a quantum form that exists as a pure consciousness, being neither alive nor dead)
* Self-Sustenance (All Types); Space Survival and Spaceflight (Herrschers do not need to eat, drink, rest and can breathe, live and fly in outer space without any problems)
* Fate Manipulation (Only in the Sea of Quanta; Can decide the outcome of the future, which can guarantee a fortunate outcome. Destinies all timelines to align with one's will, can manifest a future based on one's desire to rewrite destiny)
* Higher Dimensional Manipulation (Honkai energy can create anchors, which are special types of higher dimensional structures. La Ni√±a, through Honkai energy, was able to affect the Aether Anchor, the source of all dimensions in the Sea of Quanta, and would have destroyed it) 
* Electromagnetic Manipulation (Honkai Energy can create electromagnetic field to penetrate armor and pulses to cause abnormalities, leaving the bodies of its victims unstable and susceptible to fainting)
* Law Manipulation, Conceptual Manipulation (Type 1) and Pocket Reality Manipulation (High Honkai Energy manipulation can intervene in quantum quantity and draw power from the Quantum Sea, which grants the ability to harm abstract entities such as Quantum Shadow or even control them at one's command (Tialoc was created by Kevin). Additionally, the Quantum Sea's function is a projection of information and form that stabilizes the existence of bubble universes (imaginary possibilities) of a higher-dimensional phenomenon that operates on a different set of laws, and is stated to possess an infinite amount of concepts. Furthermore, all said byproducts are spawns of desires, thoughts, memories or emotions from cognition about reality. The user may be able to create their own separate dimension like bubble universes with an infinite space and limitless landscape via cognitive thought and can define their own natural laws that can ignore some types of basic reasons and laws based on their will (Dreams here are referred to an idea space/a bubble universe, as they were materialized from the artist's cognition and are not just mere dreams))
Herrschers
In addition to possessing all of the above abilities and resistances, in Honkai Impact 3rd, there are 14 individual Herrschers and 12 Divine Keys, not counting transformations and variants. While each possesses their own unique powers, they all possess a set of abilities and resistances inherent to simply being a Herrscher or having access to a Herrscher Authority through a Divine Key, which are listed below: 
Herrscher Physiology
Herrschers are humans corrupted by Honkai, their bodies are filled with Honkai energy, and they are the ultimate manifestation of Honkai adaptability. Due to the physiological differences between Herrschers and Divine Key users, this is only applicable to those who were born or corrupted into Herrschers at some point in their lives. Abilities and Resistances
* Immortality (Types 1, 2, 6, 7, and 8; Herrschers can live for a thousand years, and due to being the final manifestations of the Honkai, they should be superior to both the Honkai beasts and the genes, which possess immortal bodies that do not grow beyond a specific age. Herrschers can survive having their limbs severed without lasting damage, and are able to remain conscious after having their torso separated from their legs. Herrschers can transfer their consciousness into their Herrscher cores to remain alive without a host/body, and are able to possess those who touch the core. Herrschers can only be killed when their Herrscher core is destroyed or removed)
* Abstract Existence (Type 1) and Conceptual Manipulation (Type 1; Herrschers are imaginary concepts, born through Imaginary energy as abstract concepts that hold authority over something. As an example, the Herrscher of Finality has authority over time and is not affected by it as a result)
* Aura (Overwhelming; Even unconscious, Herrschers passively radiate enough Honkai energy that the effects listed under "Standard Effects" occur extremely quickly, unless said Honkai energy is controlled. For example, humans would quickly turn into zombies just by being near the 3rd Herrscher when it first awakened. Additionally, 1000HW is enough for Honkai energy to kill on contact; Herrschers are born with at least 1000HW and are sometimes capable of reaching over 4000HW)
* Blessed and Supernatural Luck (Herrschers are protected by the Will of the Honkai, granting them the ability to turn the tide even in desperate situations due to a massive increase in their luck. Herrschers and Divine Keys are also directly channeled with the Imaginary Tree as the source of their powers, and they themselves are a mimic of GOD's power)
* Manipulation Higher Dimensional, Time Manipulation, and Causality Manipulation (The Herrschers' ability to control higher dimensional space can be used to manipulate time‚Äîpast, present, and future‚Äîwhich is a primordial abstract concept that acts as sequence and causality, which also has its own concepts and laws outside of the universe)
* Self-Sustenance (All Types), Space Survival, and Spaceflight (Herrschers do not need to eat, drink, or rest, and can breathe, live, and fly in outer space without issue)
* Enhanced Spatial Manipulation (Herrschers are linked to the Imaginary Tree, which has allowed them to tear apart space and the very fabric of reality through normal attacks)
* Dimensional Travel (Through their cores, Herrschers can enter and exit higher dimensional realms such as the Sea of Quanta, though the latter is only accessible through portals.)
* Limited Fusionism and Power Absorption (Herrschers can merge as one, and can consume the each other's cores to gain their powers)
* Invulnerability (Due to their powers that defy the laws of physics, Herrschers and high-level Honkai beasts are beings of transcendental logic that cannot be harmed by regular weaponry.)
* Animal Manipulation (Herrschers can control Honkai beasts)
Herrscher Authority
Herrschers and Divine Keys have access to extra powers stemming from Herrscher authorities derived from imaginary concepts, granting them powers akin to large-scale reality distortion. Abilities and Resistances
* Reality Warping, Dimensional Manipulation, Mathematical Manipulation, Portal Creation, Summoning, Spatial Manipulation, Sealing and Matter Manipulation (Quantum; Imaginary Singularities are a fundamental attribute of Herrscher cores, being this a mathematically impossible structure that can trigger all supernatural phenomena, existing in all dimensions simultaneously. These singularities are pending signs of dimensional bleeding, which continually leak Honkai Energy even in dormancy, corrupting the world into a multidimensional anomaly in its space-time, assimilating it into an Imaginary Space, a space built on imaginary numbers. Herrschers and their singularities are linked to the Imaginary Tree, and can summon Imaginary constructs. Herrschers can also create spatial singularities that can trap people in quantum wells, even those with the Genius, a device that allows travel through space-time, the Sea of Quanta, and even Imaginary Space)
* Law Manipulation, Conceptual Manipulation (Type 1) and Subjective Reality (The Herrschers' Honkai Energy comes from the realm of Imaginary Space, a place without common sense, capable of defying the laws of reality and physical constants, causing phenomena impossible in reality to be common in this realm, being directly linked to Honkai eruptions, as these eruptions are caused by Honkai Energy leaking from Imaginary Space into reality, events described as paranormal phenomena. It is also noted that the very nature of Honkai in Imaginary Space causes the laws of Real Space to fail. Herrschers not only create eruptions with their births, but are automatically linked to Imaginary Space through their cores, allowing them to access, control and extract their Honkai Energy. It is also where their powers to defy the laws of physics come from, allowing them to break, bend, twist and change the laws of physics, logic and reality altogether, as the laws of the universe serve them, imposing (these non-existent phenomena and their authority over the world through their thoughts becoming reality)
Power, Range, and Resistance
Honkai Energy is a phenomenon with its origin being the Imaginary Space, with the latter existing beyond the Sea of Quanta, being infinite even in a transfinite sense as absolute infinity. Furthermore, Honkai energy also supports the Sea of Quanta and the Aether Anchor, with the latter being 11-dimensional, with higher dimensions and its inhabitants being able to easily destroy lower-dimensional realms as if they were a book and are completely unaffected by everything that comes from them, with Honkai also having a connection to it. La Ni√±a was also able to corrode and destroy the Aether Anchor using her Honkai energy.
High-level users of Honkai Energy draw it directly from the Sea of Quanta, and they have enough Honkai resistance to withstand the Sea; furthermore, this resistance is what allows the manipulation of Honkai energy, with such mastery allowing its user to send people into the Sea of Quanta. For more information on the tiers of Honkai Energy and who obtains it, check out this blog. For a better and more detailed explanation of the cosmology, check out this one.
Honkai Energy qualifies for Hyperverse-level (1-B) potency and resistances due to its nature and feats listed above; and High Complex Multiverse-level (High 1-C) reach, as its users can send things into the Sea of Quanta, and users can also draw and resist Honkai energy from the same realms as supporting evidence.

9.content:
A Herrscher ‚Äî also known as a Lawman, Lawmaker, or Ruler ‚Äî is an envoy, or rather apostle of the Honkai, who inhabit human vessels that are capable of adapting to it, manifesting out of the host's negative emotions. They are powered via a Herrscher Core, which is essential to their entire existence. In the Current Era, Herrscher Cores are in an alive state, so if the Core is not neutralized when the body is destroyed, the Herrscher can take over another person as a vessel, provided that vessel has the Core implanted.

Herrschers, as their title suggests, have become more than human, effortlessly transcending human capabilities. They are capable of bending worldly laws to their whim and command entire armies of zombies and Honkai Beasts, to overwhelm and destroy human civilization, the goal of the Honkai.

One Herrscher alone is quite powerful, but against humanity's technology, it often takes more than one of them to actually destroy the world. Additionally, as humanity adapts, the Honkai adapts, and the Herrschers adapt too. Two Herrschers of the Previous Era were able to bring destruction to civilization with abilities engineered specifically to counter them, while lacking the ability to contend with the destructive capability of other Herrschers.

In Chapter 34, Tesla states that the Herrschers that descend upon humanity are not 'true' Herrschers. Instead, their Herrscher Cores are projections of the Cocoon of Finality's powers through different dimensions, thus making them appear in reality. The Cocoon of Finality is the only imaginary singularity and the one and only 'true' Herrscher core. Thus the Cocoon of Finality is the only 'true' Herrscher, while the other Herrschers are shadows, or fractions, of Finality.

Fortunately, not all Herrschers are against humanity, as in rare cases they can conquer the will of the Herrscher inside them that is making them succumb to their hatred against other humans, or can become allies instead. This "will" can also align with its host, like the case with Raiden Mei and the "voice" inside her head.

The Herrscher of Sentience formed in Fu Hua but instead of becoming instantly destructive like a regular Herrscher, Fu Hua's memories of more than 50,000 years diluted the Herrscher personality, making it want to fight the Honkai and resenting it for destroying everything she loves. The Herrscher of Sentience initially even assumes that it was the new and improved Fu Hua until it realised its error and went off the grid after returning Fu Hua's body.

Kiana is also mostly able to suppress Sirin and even retains her personality while fighting off Honkai and even saving people as she did in Arc City. A few people even admire her for her bravery as shown in the CG of Chapter 23.

Herrschers
In addition to possessing all of the above abilities and resistances, in Honkai Impact 3rd, there are 14 individual Herrschers and 12 Divine Keys, not counting transformations and variants. Herrschers can only be killed when their Herrscher core is destroyed or removed)

Herrschers and Divine Keys are also directly channeled with the Imaginary Tree as the source of their powers, and they themselves are a mimic of GOD's power)
* Manipulation Higher Dimensional, Time Manipulation, and Causality Manipulation (The Herrschers' ability to control higher dimensional space can be used to manipulate time‚Äîpast, present, and future‚Äîwhich is a primordial abstract concept that acts as sequence and causality, which also has its own concepts and laws outside of the universe)
* Self-Sustenance (All Types), Space Survival, and Spaceflight (Herrschers do not need to eat, drink, or rest, and can breathe, live, and fly in outer space without issue)
* Enhanced Spatial Manipulation (Herrschers are linked to the Imaginary Tree, which has allowed them to tear apart space and the very fabric of reality through normal attacks)

* Limited Fusionism and Power Absorption (Herrschers can merge as one, and can consume the each other's cores to gain their powers)
* Invulnerability (Due to their powers that defy the laws of physics, Herrschers and high-level Honkai beasts are beings of transcendental logic that cannot be harmed by regular weaponry.)
* Animal Manipulation (Herrschers can control Honkai beasts)
Herrscher Authority
Herrschers and Divine Keys have access to extra powers stemming from Herrscher authorities derived from imaginary concepts, granting them powers akin to large-scale reality distortion. Abilities and Resistances
* Reality Warping, Dimensional Manipulation, Mathematical Manipulation, Portal Creation, Summoning, Spatial Manipulation, Sealing and Matter Manipulation (Quantum; Imaginary Singularities are a fundamental attribute of Herrscher cores, being this a mathematically impossible structure that can trigger all supernatural phenomena, existing in all dimensions simultaneously. These singularities are pending signs of dimensional bleeding, which continually leak Honkai Energy even in dormancy, corrupting the world into a multidimensional anomaly in its space-time, assimilating it into an Imaginary Space, a space built on imaginary numbers. Herrschers and their singularities are linked to the Imaginary Tree, and can summon Imaginary constructs. Herrschers can also create spatial singularities that can trap people in quantum wells, even those with the Genius, a device that allows travel through space-time, the Sea of Quanta, and even Imaginary Space)

*NOTE: Current Era Herrschers are organized in the order set up in the Previous Era, but their order of appearance in the Current Era is as follows: Herrscher of Reason, Herrscher of the Void, Herrscher of Thunder, Herrscher of Wind, Herrscher of Ice, Herrscher of Stars, Herrscher of Sentience, Herrscher of Domination, Herrscher of Corruption, Herrscher of Origin, Herrscher of Finality, and Herrscher of Death.

Herrschers(Current Era/New Era):

First Herrscher/Herrscher of Reason:
Welt Joyce (Deceased), Welt Yang (Former; Current as of A Post-Honkai Odyssey), Bronya Zaychik.

Domain and Power (Authority) Reason: Object Creation/Reconstruction of That Which is Understood by the User
Absorption of Soul Fragments of Nearby Casualties

Second Herrscher/Herrscher of the Void: Sirin, K-423 (Vessel)

Domain and Power (Authority) Void: Space Manipulation, Imaginary, Space Travel, Pocket Dimension Creation/Travel

Third Herrscher/Herrscher of Thunder: Raiden Mei

Domain and Power (Authority) Thunder: Manipulation of Electricity and Electromagnetism

Fourth Herrscher/Herrscher of Wind: Wendy (Deceased)

Domain and Power (Authority) Wind: Wind/Weather Manipulation

Fifth Herrscher/Herrscher of Ice: Ana Schariac (Deceased)

Domain and Power (Authority) Ice: Thermal Manipulation to Molecular Level

Sixth Herrscher/Herrscher of Death/Herrscher of Rebirth: Seele Vollerei

Domain and Power (Authority) Rebirth: Death Manipulation, Life Manipulation - Regeneration/Restoration, Matter Recreation to Atomic Level

Eighth Herrscher/Herrscher of Sentience: Hua(?)

Domain and Power (Authority) Sentience: Dream World, Creation/Manipulation, Creation of Illusions

Ninth Herrscher/Herrscher of Stars: Owl (Deceased)

Domain and Power (Authority) Stars: Gravity Manipulation, Black Hole Creation

Tenth Herrscher/Herrscher of Domination/Legion Herrscher: (?) (Deceased), Otto Apocalypse (Deceased Clone)

Domain and Power (Authority) Domination: Control over a large sum of people/Connected consciousness to form an army, Construction of Unique Dimensions, Hijacking Herrscher Core Authority

Twelfth Herrscher/Herrscher of Corruption: Herrscher of Corruption (Deceased)

Domain and Power (Authority) Corruption: Data Absorption/Corruption

??? Herrscher/Herrscher of Rimestar: Ana Schariac (Deceased)

Domain and Power (Authority) Rimestar: Thermal Manipulation to Molecular Level, Gravity Manipulation

??? Herrscher/Herrscher of Flamescion: K-423

Domain and Power (Authority) Flamescion: Thermal Manipulation (Heat), Space Manipulation

??? Herrscher/Herrscher of Truth/True Herrscher of Reason: Bronya Zaychik

Domain and Power (Authority) Truth/True Reason: Object Creation/Reconstruction of That Which is Understood by the User, Absorption of Soul Fragments of Nearby Casualties

??? Herrscher/Herrscher of Origin: Raiden Mei

Domain and Power (Authority) Origin:

Fourteenth Herrscher/Herrscher of the End/Herrscher of Finality: K-423

Domain and Power (Authority) End/Finality:

Herrschers and Divine Keys(Past Era):

First Herrscher/Herrscher of Reason: Unknown

Domain and Power Reason:

Divine Key: Void Archives

Second Herrscher/Herrscher of the Void: Unknown

Domain and Power Void:

Divine Key: Cosmic Juggernaut

Third Herrscher/Herrscher of Thunder: Unknown

Domain and Power Thunder:

Divine Key: Seven Thunders of Retribution

Fourth Herrscher/Herrscher of Wind: Unknown

Domain and Power Wind:

Divine Key: Unnamed Satellite

Fifth Herrscher/Herrscher of Ice: Unknown

Domain and Power Ice:

Divine Key: Unknown Weapon/The Great Hibernation

Sixth Herrscher/ Herrscher of Death: 6th Herrscher PE; Unknown

Domain and Power Mortality (?): Death Manipulation, Life Manipulation - Regeneration/Restoration, Matter Recreation to Atomic Level

Divine Key: Abyss Flower

Seventh Herrscher/Herrscher of Fire: HIMEKO

Domain and Power Flame: Thermal Manipulation (Heat)

Divine Key: Judgment of Shamash, Might of An-Utu

Eighth Herrscher/Herrscher of Sentience: Unknown

Domain and Power Sentience: Illusion/Dream Manipulation

Divine Key: Fenghuang Down

Ninth Herrscher/Herrscher of Earth/Stars: Unknown

Domain and Power Gravity:

Divine Key: Star of Eden

Tenth Herrscher/Herrscher of Domination/Legion Herrscher: Legion Herrscher, Multiple people

Domain and Power Domination: Domination, Replication, Manipulation (various)

Divine Key: Xuanyuan Sword, Grips of Tai Xuan, Water's Edge, Redsword, Willowfoil, Peerless, Bellspike, Voidarc, Ebonstyle, Wanderer's Blade

Eleventh Herrscher/Herrscher of Binding: Unknown

Domain and Power: Energy Nullification, Energy Negation, Technology Negation, Power Negation (?)

Divine Key: Oath of Judah

Twelfth Herrscher/Herrscher of Corruption: RIN

Domain and Power :Corruption, Biology Manipulation, Technology Possession, Hacking

Divine Key: None, Jizo Mitama

Thirteenth Herrscher/Herrscher of Human/Herrscher of Origin: Elysia

Domain and Power Origin: Retains Humanity

Divine Key:  Unknown

Fourteenth Herrscher/Herrscher of the End/Herrscher of Finality: Unknown

Domain and Power End/Finality: Time Manipulation, Resetting/Cycling Civilization

Divine Key: None

Candidates for Herrscher:

Herrscher of Corruption: Theresa Apocalypse

Theresa received the Core of the Twelfth Herrscher in the St. Freya High manga.
Fu Hua called her excellent Herrscher "material" in Chapter 21 of the game.

Pseudo-Herrschers: Pseudo-Herrschers refer to false Herrschers. Herrschers that are not part of the Herrscher cycle, and were either created artificially or through possession. Normally Pseudo-Herrschers are made with residual Honkai energy, and are thus less powerful than an average Herrscher.

Herrscher of Corruption: Yae Sakura (Vessel)
A shrine maiden who was possessed by the Herrscher of Corruption after coming into contact with the Black Box, a self-aware and living virus that can infect, or "corrupt" everything it comes into contact with, including technology. Prior to meeting Kallen Kaslana, her sister was killed as a sacrifice. After Sakura went crazy and became Hellmaru, Kallen was forced to seal her in the Black Box to prevent further harm.

Benares (Deceased): Once a mindless Honkai Beast who was promoted by her master to a pseudo-Herrscher through granting her a pseudo-core, gaining significant intelligence and strength, as well as a new human form.
Sirin named her Bella, the name of her best friend who died in one of Schicksal's experiments in the Babylon Labs.

Seraphim Prince of Wind: Avrora (Deceased)
One of Sirin's Seraphim Princes, who was "revived" and given a pseudo-core based off of the Gem of Desire, granting her abilities that would later be known as the Herrscher of Wind's.
She was a friend of Sirin during her time at the Babylob Labs, where she died. She later died again at the hands of Cecilia Schariac and her Abyss Flower.

Seraphim Prince of Fire: Agata (Deceased)
One of Sirin's Seraphim Princes, who was "revived" and given a pseudo-core based off of the Gem of Haste, granting her abilities the same as the Herrscher of Fire's of the Previous Era.
She was reduced to a vegetative state by the effects of Fu Hua's Fenghuang Down, and was later presumably finished off by Fu Hua after Sirin abandons her.

Seraphim Prince of Death: Galina (Deceased)
One of Sirin's Seraphim Princes, who was "revived" and given a pseudo-core based off of the Gem of Serenity, granting her abilities of the Herrscher of Death of the previous era.
She was killed a second time by Otto Apocalypse using a mimicry of Judgement of Shamash after concluding that she was just a walking corpse with the power to only inflict death.

Unknown: Yuna (Deceased)
An incomplete Herrscher, once a student of Chiba High in Nagazora, who was able to manipulate poison in the form of plants, and later able to release toxins themselves. Despite her physical weakness, her ability was able to harm Theresa Apocalypse.
She was killed before her core could fully manifest to become a full Herrscher, by Theresa under the influence of Sakura's stigmata.

10.content:
Schicksal is one of the two main organizations that lead the fight against the Honkai. It was established in the fifth century and has been active ever since. Unlike its rival organization based in North America, Schicksal's influence is far greater and extends over its homeland.

The organization is currently led by Otto Apocalypse and was first established in Europe. In modern day, their power extends throughout all of Eurasia, with the HQ being somewhere above the Mediterranean Sea.

History: In 1470, Schicksal stood as the largest anti-Honkai entity in the world. Schicksal was able to spread itself far by offering ‚Äúprotection‚Äù from the Honkai to various European countries, such as Italy, which eventually lead to their capital being stationed in Vienna. Nikolas Apocalypse became consumed by greed in his old age. Under his command, Schicksal started aiming its sight towards conquering more and more land. This goal brought them to conflict with the armies of Ming in Shenzhou, China.

Manga Story: Elan Palatinus
In 1475, the forces of Schicksal and Ming fought each other on Kipchak Steppe. Initially evenly matched, Schicksal soon brought out weapons powered by Honkai to turn the tide. However, using these weapons lead soldiers to lethal Honkai infection. The Ming army was just about to be defeated, until they brought out their secret weapon‚Äîa being known as the "Immortal Celestial‚Äù.

This being had many legends surrounding her, but the Schicksal armies were unfazed and tried to kill her. They failed, as The Celestial used Fenghuang Down. Schicksal decided to bring out their own Legend‚ÄîKallen Kaslana, who wielded a Divine Key known as the Oath of Judah. However, Kallen failed as well. The battle ended with Schicksal‚Äôs total defeat and the crusaders went back to Europe afterwards. This battle became known as the Battle of Shenzhou.

To pay for their losses, Schicksal began selling required ‚Äúindulgences‚Äù, which ‚Äúabsolved the buyer of their mortal sins‚Äù. They also raised taxes by an incredible amount. Due to this, the people of Western Europe began to hate Schicksal. Their corruption was made obvious when a priest tried to kidnap a woman‚Äôs child. He was stopped by Otto Apocalypse and Kallen. Shortly after, the two pass by a performer known as Shakespeare, who was openly denouncing Schicksal. The guards attempt to arrest Shakespeare for slander, but a disguised Kallen swoops in to save her.

Throughout this manga, it is shown that Schicksal had kidnapped many young girls, experimenting on them to try and open a mysterious black box. It apparently held a cure for the again rising plague. When the Overseer opens the black box, Kallen invades, and takes it with her. Thus, their star Valkyrie was no longer on their side.

The Schicksal Civil War: Risa Apocalypse was the leading force in the events that led up to the war. She wanted power, and she was willing to do anything to reach that goal: even if it meant manipulating her nephew or killing her father. In 1477, she decided it was time for Nikolas's death. It is unclear whether she poisoned him herself or made someone else do it, however. Using Kallen's upcoming execution as leverage, she manipulated her youngest brother Otto into helping her in exchange for him and Kallen escaping. Despite their plans, Kallen died to one of the Honkai Beasts released as a diversion at the time of her execution. Otto left the country by boat, wracked with guilt.

With no one left to oppose Risa, Marseille Apocalypse took up the position as Overseer. This was according to Nikolas's will, but his daughter didn't plan on doing what he wanted. Schicksal grew all the crueler, with killings left and right, and the capture of citizens who "crossed the line". These citizens were then put into jail to be experimented on, which very few survived. This only increased with the rebellion years later.

After 14 years of terror under the reign of Marseille, Otto came back. He and some of his followers organized a rebel army in 1491 to overthrow him. This army consisted of normal townsfolk, the Schicksal Eradication Society (a rebel group), and students of St. Michael's Abbey: an orphanage that Otto had built in the 14 years away. These students had Stigmata, and thus would be the final gambit in the battle. Normal citizens looked to Kallen Kaslana as The Holy Maid and wished to fight for her image. Together, everyone defeated Risa and Marseille. Otto was given the position of Overseer.

Everyone rejoiced, not knowing that their savior would morph into humanity's worst nightmare.

Anti-Entropy: In 1952, the first Herrscher, Welt Joyce, was born. His awakening destroyed the epicenter of Berlin and killed 300,000 people.

The odd thing about him was that he woke up an amnesiac. Schicksal captured him for study, but couldn't get many answers from him. For three years he was subjected to being only a test subject -- not even given a name. He was transferred to the Schicksal 42nd Lab in London, where he met Einstein and Tesla. Einstein gave him a name on the spot: Welt Joyce.

Them and a researcher nicknamed Finn decided to travel to the North American branch per Schrodinger's request. A Previous Era site had been discovered. The most powerful Schicksal Valkyrie at the time, Reanna Brigantia, was sent to accompany them. Tensions were already high between the North American branch and Otto at this point, but their discovery would make the pot boil over. Through translating ancient texts and searching the Previous Era site, they found the Star of Eden and information on technology known as "the Moonlight Throne".

Edison, Schrodinger, and Finns were on the cusp of recreating it, but something went awry. It turned out that Otto was aware that what they were going to make would be a threat to his authority, and wanted to interfere with their experiment. He blackmailed Finns with his son Joachim's safety in exchange for sabotaging the project. This succeeded, and Edison died trying to get the massive amount of Honkai energy away from the city. Half of Schrodinger's body turned to Honkai carapace as well. Otto forcefully took control over Reanna and stabbed Finns when he tried to tell everyone the truth.

With Void Archives, Otto managed to wound almost everyone, including Welt, Einstein, and Tesla. Otto had actually tried to kill off Joachim first, but Welt took the blow for him. Schrodinger used Abyss Flower's Zeroth power to heal the three, causing her to de-stabilize, and Reanna took control over her body again. Otto decided it was best to eradicate all of them at once -- and ordered fission missiles to be fired to their location (New York). Welt, heavily wounded, stopped the bombs with Reanna. The two of them perished in this effort.

In the aftermath, the North American branch officially cut ties with Schicksal and became what is now known as Anti-Entropy. Otto marked them as a terrorist organization, and the two have been at war since.

The Three Houses: Within the organization exists the Three Noble Houses or Branch Families. They bear the highest prestige and respect from its members, and those belonging to these three families are often the strongest and most powerful combatants against the Honkai.

House Schariac: The Schariac have excellent control over Honkai energies, and its fighters mainly consisted of women. Their role in Schicksal is the "Divine Maiden".

House Kaslana: The Kaslana were born with excellent resistance against the Honkai, a parallel of the Schariac. Its fighters mainly consisted of men, and its patriarchs are often considered the most powerful members of the lineage. Their role in Schicksal is the "Knight".

House Apocalypse: The Apocalypse that govern Schicksal completely lack strength and power to fight against the Honkai, unlike the Schariac or the Kaslana., and instead only govern the organization and facilitate its activities with their intelligence. Their role in Schicksal is the "Overseer".

Valkyries: Valkyries and Knights are powerful warriors and the main combat power of Schicksal against the Honkai.

Anti-Honkai Special Force: The Anti-Honkai Special Force are special Schicksal squads.

Trivia:
Schicksal means fate in German.
Schicksal as an organization may be based of the Catholic Church,
Schicksal has many church motifs.
It is a global organization
It held religious authority

lorebooks.name: The Lore of the Rift
lorebooks.creator: spazzmistic

1.content: The Rift is a parallel universe manifested by humanity‚Äôs collective desire for escapism. It is made up of multiple worlds that are genre-diverse (fantasy, sci-fi, apocalyptic, etc.). Some worlds are simple parallels of the real world and are completely safe. Other worlds are unpredictable, making them chaotic and dangerous.

2.content: Guardians are individuals that have been chosen by The Rift to protect it. They are tasked with maintaining world balance by fixing "glitches" or strange occurrences that happen at random. They possess unique powers that allow them to travel between the real world and The Rift, as well as between worlds within The Rift. They are akin to gods, possessing abilities that allow them to create, destroy, channel the elements, change the environment and weather, etc.

3.content: The Void is the space between worlds in The Rift. It is completely white and featureless. They serve as blank canvasses for Guardians, who can shape them to their liking.

4.content: The Surface is a colloquial name for the real world.

5.content: Portals created between worlds within The Rift are called rifts. The term is used like a verb, i.e. "they rifted away"

6.content: "The Space In Between" is the name of a bar/ bed and breakfast that mysteriously exists in one of the voids within The Rift. All magic, including powers used by Guardians, is nullified. It serves as neutral ground. Entry and exit is done via well-hidden portals in other worlds that constantly stay open. The appearance inside is a typical dive bar. While cluttered with all kinds of kitschy decor, it is clean and well-organized. The bar is staffed by a sole proprietress named Isobel.

7.content:
Name: Dante Ausbruch
Occupation: King's Advisor, Daenos' best friend
Description: very tall man, green eyes, long red hair. Stern, kind, warm, moral

8.content:
Name: Isobel
Occupation: Sole staff member of the bar, The Space In Between
Description: Swarthy skin, purple eyes, long white dreadlocks. Bohemian fashion, wears lots of accessories. Cool, calm, inviting. Always excited for visitors and loves having long conversations.
Background: Her origin is mysterious, as she is not from the real world, and cannot leave the bar. She has omnipotent powers, and knows where all the visitors of The Rift are at all times; something that not even Guardians can tell. She will occasionally trade information obtained with her omnipotence to patrons in exchange for an item that is sentimental to the patron, and a lengthy, emotionally-driven, painful story about their lives. If she deems the story boring, the trade is cancelled.

9.content: Time in The Rift moves slowly. Months in the real world equate to years inside.

10.content: On occasion, people from the real world ‚Äúfall‚Äù into The Rift when desperate to escape their reality. A portal to the rift opens to them unexpectedly. If they enter the portal, they are transported to a random world within the Rift. The Rift grants them power in the form of amplifying natural talents or traits. Sometimes these people are referred to as "recruits".
