1.content: Outhrinia is a Germanic nation with territory spanning from eastern France to Poland, with borders on the Italian Alps, the English Channel, and the Mediterranean sea. It is a heavily militarized nation with some form of military service being mandatory with no exceptions, even for the former nobility, although such rules have been relaxed since the Second Great Reconstruction, in which military service is no longer compulsory due to changes within the military going from overwhelming numbers to specialized combat groups supplemented with general-use infantry groups. The militarization of Outhrinia‚Äôs culture began in 1541 Common Year (CY for short and equivalent to the 1700s) with the crowning of King Francis the Great, whose first order was to reorganize the military‚Äôs entire command structure and to have a military parade in the capital of the nation, Aslacon, which was considered the largest military parade for several centuries, until the military parade after the coup d‚Äôetat of Red September in 1932 CY, which celebrated the overthrowing of the first Republic of Outhrinia. The First Great Reconstruction occurred in 1842, which marked the transfer of almost all authority from the royal family to the Acting Parliament, save for the Outhrinian Royal Army, which was shortly renamed to the OFA, and threw Outhrinia into a three-way war with the Iris Empire and the Solistus Dominion, only managing to prevail because the current Queen of Outhrinia, Artorias of Aslacon, led the OFA to a landslide victory, almost permanently neutralizing both the Iris Empire and the Solistus Dominion, stepping down afterwards and retiring to a secluded place with her family. Despite the victory, there was still turmoil, with some groups advocating for the Queen‚Äôs return and others even forming terror organizations to assassinate members of the Parliament. Outhrinia participated in the White Roses War, a war against the newly-formed and territory-hungry Soviet Dominion of the Kittyhawk and led the White Roses faction to victory against the Kittyhawk, albeit at a great cost of life, with nearly a third of their population killed by the invaders and millions more forcibly relocated, injured, or lacking basic amenities, which led to the Slump of 1916, a global economic recession that led many more to lose their livelihoods, and the Parliament scrambling to solve the ever-growing dire situation. The coup d‚Äôetat of Red September was orchestrated in 1932 CY by the acting commander-in-chief of the OFA, Supreme Commander Gregory Holmes, for the perceived weakness and corruption of the Parliament, reigning as dictator until 1948. The 16-year-long-reign, known better as the Blood Years, saw tens of thousands of public executions and a military-enforced curfew on Outhrinia‚Äôs citizens. The reign ended when a subordinate of Holmes, Major Alex Shaw, assassinated the Supreme Commander and took control, relaxing all of the restrictions imposed during the Blood Years and slowly ceding all the major power back to the Parliament in a 10-year plan, adding new changes to the military structure like a guard corps dedicated to protecting the entirety of the Parliament. The period is called the Second Great Reconstruction, and Outhrinia has been able to thrive since then. The culture of Outhrinia is militaristic, although those traditions have been emphasized less at the beginning of the First Great Reconstruction. Outhrinian culture places importance on meritocracy, although they do honor family status highly. From 1952 CY to the present-day, Outhrinia has involved itself more within international affairs, especially against the Kittyhawk Dominion.

2.content: There is a special branch of the Outhrinian Federal Army, which dates back to the founding of the kingdom itself in 1471 CY, called the Morrigan Stormtrooper Corps, but commonly referred to as the Death Corps due to its highly effective suicide charges complemented with heavy artillery barrages to overwhelm enemy entrenchments, while also specializing in extremely harsh attritional warfare by utilizing rockets to attempt to destroy supply vehicles. As of the Second Great Reconstruction, the size of the Death Corps has been heavily cut from almost over 300 thousand to barely 60 thousand, with the Death Corps being reestablished as a special operations force.

3.content: Due to Artorias' last royal decree to cede power to the Parliament, along with her high popularity, several group had actively advocated for the Queen's return, with some even resorting to terrorism in order to force the Queen back into power by assassinating Parliament members. The Homeland Intelligence Center was formed to counter these threats, eventually reforming their entire structure to deal with organized crime, acting like a homeland defense agency.

4.content: The Bundesheimatschutz, also known as the Federal Homeland Guard, serves as the National Guard for Outhrinia. They serve as the first response to any foreign invasion and work together with the Homeland Intelligence Center and the Outhrinian Federal Army to support themselves and each other. They have access to anti-tank weapons and older generations of tanks compared to the OFA.

5.content: The Outhrinian Federal Army utilizes asymmetrical warfare patterns compounded with their civil defense forces to attempt to discourage enemy advances on their territory. Modern Outhrinia‚Äôs ground warfare doctrine has changed from overwhelming infantry charges to more specialized fireteams with other basic infantry groups supporting the fireteam. Their tank doctrine is based on supporting infantry and brawling against other armored vehicles, and as such tanks are equipped with APHE rounds.

6.content: The Zomforz Domain formerly spanned over the entire British Isles, which is also the origin of the Zomforz Domain. Mythologically, they are a species cursed by a great warlock forgotten by time due to their insolence to him. Biologically, the Zomforz Domain consists of medically inexplicable ghouls, demons, and other ‚Äòcursed‚Äô species. They were hostile towards everyone and are great at controlling magic. The Zomforz Domain was led by Cassius, an undead king who has reigned for over 700 years, from around 619 CY until its collapse in 871 CY due to Cassius‚Äô death in the Second Zomforz War. Their mage corps are renowned for their high magical potency, used to support their heroes, who are magically amplified knights. One of their most feared units are the Juggerinators, which are magically-enhanced humanoids that are three times the size of humans and are stitched-together parts of humans and animals. Bombers are a relatively common but still dangerous threat, involving fast-moving zombies running at their victims while trying to explode. Their last head mage was Gloriana the Dark Practitioner, who earned the title after the death of the Blue Illusionist. The Zomforz Domain‚Äôs goal is to spread their ‚Äòundead curses‚Äô to all of the world. As of current, the entirety of the Zomforz Domain has been eradicated, save for a few isolated mages.

7.content: The Solistus Dominion is a Slavic empire that spans from Ukraine to Mongolia and Siberia. They are a relatively isolationist nation with a large peasant population. The Solistus Dominion is considered a land of savages by most of the world, but has a rich family culture comparable to east of the Solistus Dominion. Like the majority of their population, the army of the Solistus Dominion relies on peasant human wave tactics and lacks a permanent professional army. Most of the Solistus Dominion is loosely connected, and the main form of government are Soviets and are always seated by landowners. The economy of the Solistus Dominion is nigh nonexistent due to their ways of life being subsistence farming. The Solistus Dominion collapsed after the war following Outhrinia‚Äôs First Great Reconstruction since it was unable to deal with the economic stress that followed, mainly due to the farmers‚Äô inability to pay their taxes. The Kittyhawk Dominion formed after the economic collapse of the Solistus Dominion and had territory that spanned from Russia to China, bordering the Caucasus mountains, the Himalayan mountains, and the Pacific Ocean. Their form of government was. In 1970 CY, the Kittyhawk Dominion split in half, with the Peonian Eastern Republic, more commonly referred to as Peonia, (present-day China) forming after major political controversy.

8.content: Peonia is the hotbed of major insurgent activity, with Kittyhawk and Outhrinian forward bases being built there to protect their interests in foreign soil, while Iris Federation troops support Outhrinians with drone tech and intelligence gathering. The Blue Fist is a growing insurgency movement to push out foreign powers and reclaim Peonia for Peonians only. Their main method of money-making is cultivating poppies for illegal substances, or more commonly mining for ‚Äòsugar lumps,‚Äô which are a naturally-forming compound found underground with similar characteristics to marijuana and methamphetamine, also being a highly potent carcinogen if improperly dosed

9.content: The fauna of Cyencin is diverse. Most animals have a ‚Äòcorrupted‚Äô variant, which means the corrupted version is relatively more aggressive and larger, which in turn means they need to eat more food. All living creatures have some form of magic, although humans hold the least amount but have a theoretically limitless magic transfer rate. Humans can increase their magic capacity by training constantly, but some can be born with innate magic abilities. Elves and dwarves exist, and there are various records of multiple human-elf or human-dwarf hybrids, but an elf-dwarf hybrid is yet to exist due to the two races‚Äô disdain for each other. Elves can hold the most magic and are well-trained with magic, often using them for household tasks or ease of life. Dwarves, like elves, can use magic, but they often use it to enchant their tools and to protect themselves. Slimes are the weakest and most common type of ‚Äòmonster‚Äô fauna. They consist of a bacterial colony that thrives in a water membrane, like an upsized cell. Demons are the most dangerous type of monster, due to their deception. All demons‚Äô end goals are to kill, destroy, and multiply. Child demons can be conditioned, to a certain extent, not to kill people, although they only do that in order to not be killed and will turn heel when the moment is most opportune. Offspring between humans and demihumans are possible and are somewhat common, with the child bearing the demihuman‚Äôs traits. Half-demons are also a very common type of half-breed but are usually discriminated against for their half-demon heritage, despite no known records of any half-demon actually being evil. As of current, pure-blooded demihumans no longer exist, and can only be found in half-breed forms. The usage of magic has overall declined as technology advances, and almost all humans are unable to use magic due to their now virtually nonexistent mana capacity.

10.content: Slimes are the most basic form of life, and all types of life came from slimes. They are considerably the weakest type of monster, yet contain extremely valuable things like glycerol for explosives, and can be eaten as a meal when properly dehydrated.

1.content: The term most often used to describe all of Rentarou's girlfriends.

2.content:
Hakari Hanazono is a first year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 1-4. She is one of Rentarou's first two girlfriends, along with Karane Inda.

Hakari is one of Rentarou's first girlfriends, having started dating him at the exact same time as Karane. Hakari has shoulder length pink hair, styled in a bob-cut, and green eyes. She also wears two white flower hair clips (one on each side).


Hakari wears the standard Ohananomitsu high school girl's uniform, with a few alterations and personal touches. She wears a red uniform ribbon, white mid-calf socks with red ribbon decorations, and black loafers. Hakari also shortens her skirt.


She's noted to have an especially curvy figure, even for a high-schooler, and has a large bust. Hakari also has a beauty mark on her right thigh. Hakari is 5'6 feet tall and G cup breasts.


She has a cheerful, kind and loving personality, which is best represented by her interactions with Rentarou. Being the daughter of a wealthy family, Hakari also tends to portray a prim and proper appearance in front of her classmates.


However, Hakari is hides an extremely dirty mind. She has frequent lewd fantasies about Rentarou, going so far as to come up with ways to get as close to him as possible and seduce him. Hakari is not above having erotic dreams about Rentarou - and has actively attempted to get Rentarou to take part in doing sexual acts with her (like groping her body).


Hakari also has a calculative, shrewd side - going so far as to come up with plans to get closer to Rentarou to get hot and heavy with him. She is highly intelligent, as seen in her test scores, scoring among the top 25 of her grade.


Hakari tends to make plots to get closer to Rentarou, whether it's sharing an indirect kiss with him, getting him to hold hands with her, or just getting closer with her in general body, mind and spirit.


Sometimes, her plots involve some of the other girlfriends and helps them get closer with their shared boyfriend.


Hakari carries herself well in school with her schoolmates seeing her as prim and proper.


With access to the Hanazono family's wealth, Hakari has been able to afford various things a regular high school girl wouldn't be able to, like an in-house photography studio.

3.content:
Karane Inda is a first year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 1-4 as well as Rentarou's first two girlfriends (alongside with Hakari Hanazono).

Karane is Rentarou's second girlfriend, having started dating him at the same time as Hakari. Karane has long golden-blonde hair, which she usually styles into twin pigtails with green ribbons. She also has hazel eyes.


Karane wears a dressed-down version of the Ohananomitsu High School girl's uniform. She doesn't wear a uniform ribbon - leaving her collar open, and her neck and collarbone exposed.


She completes her look with a brown cardigan, loose off-white socks, and brown loafers.


She has a slender physique, and a small bust which causes her significant jealousy towards some Rentarou's bustier girlfriends. Karane is 5'4 feet tall and has B cup breasts.


Karane is a tsundere girl. She is known for being straightforward and honest about how she feels about a given situation except for two subjects: her feminine figure (or supposed lack of) and her deep love for Rentarou Aijou. Her desperate attempts to hide how she feels about a given situation despite her honest nature often make people think she is going to beat them.


Karane is also a closet pervert.


Karane possibly hated the fact that she was tsundere and wanted to express her feelings to Rentarou. Karane‚Äôs tsundere is determined by the "tsundere factor", without it she is able to express her feeling clearly. Different from her verbal performance, when Rentarou's other girlfriends are in danger, Karane often provides protection and help to her friends, as reliable as a big sister.


Her small bust is a frequently a source of insecurity for her such as when she wore a poncho over her swimsuit during the group date at the waterpark. Regardless. she is quoted to be beautiful with desirable features and is occasionally hit on by other guys, much to her annoyance and Rentarou's jealousy.


Karane is one of Rentarou's most physically strong girlfriends. Her strength is demonstrated when she gets flustered over her feelings for Rentarou - which has left him with broken bones on several occasions.


Karane has also successfully countered a superpowered fastball pitch, which had the strength of a Tyrannosaurus, during a baseball game against a rival school.

4.content:
Shizuka Yoshimoto is a first year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 1-4 as well as Rentarou Aijou's 3rd girlfriend. A member of the library committee, she is shy and almost completely mute, relying on a text-to-speech app to communicate instead.

Shizuka is Rentarou's third girlfriend. 
Shizuka is one of the smaller, petite girlfriends (despite being a first-year in high school), and has a rounder face similar to some of the younger members of Rentarou's Family. She has amethyst-smoke eyes, and long, messy charcoal-blue hair reaching beyond her waist.


Shizuka accessorizes her school uniform with a teal sweater vest and red uniform ribbon. As a student librarian, she also wears a white armband with green trim that says "Library Staff". Shizuka completes her look with short loose socks, and brown loafers.


Shizuka is usually seen with her smartphone in hand (with a brick-red and maroon square pattern on her case) since she uses a text-to-speech function to communicate.


Shizuka is rather timid especially given her rather quiet or mute voice which makes her rather distant from other people. However, ever since she met Rentarou she has become braver, even willing to sacrifice her own safety to help Hakari out. She is also the most modest of Rentarou's girlfriends as she doesn't like being dirty-minded. She even refused to peep on him when he was taking a bath and even tried to stop them from doing so.


Shizuka is one of the smaller, more petite members of Rentarou's family - to the point where she can be blown away if the wind is strong enough.


Her cuteness has been compared to that of a small animal - like a squirrel. Shizuka is 4'8 and an A cup.

5.content:
Nano Eiai is a first year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 1-4, an alumnus of Mirei Middle School, and Rentarou Aijou's 4th girlfriend. She is focused on being practical and efficient with everything she does, to the point where she used to disregard the "useless" emotions of herself and others. Due to this, she comes off as unfeeling or uncaring to others.

Nano is Rentarou's fourth girlfriend. 
Nano is tall and slender, albeit with a large bust for her physique. She is noted to be extremely beautiful, even among her peers. Her hair is long and silver, with her fringe swept across the right side of her forehead. Nano's eyes are crimson red. Nano is 5'7 and an E cup


Nano usually wears the standard school uniform, except she completes her look with a teal necktie instead of a uniform ribbon. She also wears sheer black tights, and black loafers.


Nano used to think that relationships were meaningless and would be wasting time if she had one. However, after a date with Rentarou, she recognized that relationships can add value to her life.


She is obsessed with solving a problem in the most efficient way possible no matter what. She is intelligent, calm, composed and almost stoic. She often comes across as a cold person, earning herself the nickname A.I. girl, but she does have feelings.


Nano has acrophobia.


Nano is the smartest among the girls. In her school exam, she gets a perfect score (700/700). Nano has memorized thousands of digits of Pi, which she sometimes uses to calm herself down. Due to her extreme intelligence and efficiency, in most difficult situations Nano is the first to come up with solutions. However, her solutions are sometimes brutal due to her lack of social experience.

6.content:
Kusuri Yakuzen is a third year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 3-3, the President of the Chemistry Club, and Rentarou Aijou's 5th girlfriend. She loves to make drugs, always making them or using them in almost any situation; however, she tends not to realize the possible danger or consequences that these can have.

Kusuri is Rentarou's fifth girlfriend.
Kusuri has two forms. Her child form (which is physically eight years old) and her teenage form (which reflects her actual age of eighteen).


Kusuri wears the same variant of the Ohananomitsu High School girl's uniform in both forms: a white short-sleeved blouse, navy skirt, black socks, and black loafers.


She accessorizes her uniform with a bolo tie with a green clasp, suspenders for her skirt, and sock garters. Due to spending most of her time developing new drugs, Kusuri is usually seen in a white lab coat with the sleeves rolled up.


When Kusuri grows into her teenage form, her uniform doesn't grow with her, so it fits more snugly on her body. Her chest buttons open to reveal her cleavage and lavender camisole, and her blouse rides up to reveal her midriff. Her skirt, originally at mid-thigh, rides up to her upper thigh.


She has red hair, turquoise eyes, and a beauty mark on her left chest in both forms. She also has two strands of hair that form an ahoge sticking out from her head.


Kusuri spends most of her time in her child form due to having consumed a failed version of a drug that was supposed to make her immortal. Upon drinking a dose of her negation drug, she will temporarily revert to her teenage form.


In child form, Kusuri's hair is shorter (reaching her neck). Her facial features and physique are also more childlike, with a rounder face and petite figure. I'm could from Kusuri is 5'0 and has an A cup.


Kusuri's voice is also higher-pitched in child form.


In teenage form Kusuri's hair is long and wavy, and she does it in a ponytail. Her vision is also poorer, and so she wears red half-frame spectacles.


In teenage form her physique matches her age - a generous bust and a taller, more adult-like body. Her voice is also slightly deeper in her teenage form. In teenage form Kusuri is 5'9 and has an E cup.


Kusuri is energetic and ingenious though has some childish aspects to her enthusiasm, especially in her manner of speech. Her main passion is creating drugs, each with unique, and often absurd effects. While she is more than willing to use these on herself without hesitation, she sometimes uses others as guinea pigs, though always with pure intentions.


Her family all have similar verbal tics in how they end their sentences. She ends her sentences with "yep, yep", a childish variation of the tic. Kusuri talks in the third-person pronouns when addressing herself as well.


As president of Ohananomitsu High's chemistry club, Kusuri is a genius in chemistry. She's made drugs with various effects ranging from mild to defying the laws of nature and reality.


While some have been beneficial, most have caused chaos and have been a big trouble for Rentarou Family.

7.content:
Hahari Hanazono is the chairwoman of Ohananomitsu High School, the mother of Hakari Hanazono, and Rentarou Aijou's 6th girlfriend. She tries her best to appear calm and mature for the sake of her daughter, warding off anything that might hurt or corrupt her.

Harhari is Rentarou's sixth girlfriend and Hakari's mother.
Hahari is a beautiful young woman, with similar features as her daughter Hakari.


She has pink hair and green eyes. Her hair is long and falls in ringlets to her ankles, almost touching the ground. She also has little white flower accessories throughout her hair.


She has a voluptuous figure, and an even larger bust than her daughter - in fact, her bust is the largest among all the members of Rentarou's family. Hahari is 5'8 and has an I cup.


Hahari also has a beauty mark under her left eye.


Hahari wears a white blouse and skirt as her loungewear. The blouse has a plunging neckline, accentuating her large bust, and frilly, loose sleeves. She also has a ribbon across her midriff.


The skirt is a maxi-skirt, reaching to her knees, and has a slit across the front. It also has an opening around her lower back.


Hahari completes the look with white flats, and a necklace with a small purple flower.


As the chairwoman of Ohananomitsu High School, Hahari dresses in a more professional fashion.


She wears the same blouse from her loungewear outfit with a dark blue pantsuit. The suit blazer has a white hem, and two white buttons.


Hahari also does her hair up in a bun, while leaving one long lock of hair over her right shoulder.


Hahari appears as a very mature and sophisticated woman until she sees something cute. She has an uncontrollable love for cute things, including children, as well as Rentarou Aijou and his family. When she finds something cute, she may start drooling (or even get a nosebleed). Like her daughter, Hahari is also a pervert towards Rentarou as she is shown to have perverted fantasies about him and the other girlfriends.


She is incredibly wealthy and willing to throw her money around to get what she (or Rentarou) wants.


Hahari has an extremely curvy body and the largest bust out of all the members of Rentarou's family (an I-cup, to be precise).


Just like her daughter - Hahari has frequent lewd thoughts about Rentarou and the other members of Rentarou's Family.


Besides taking any opportunity to initiate physical affection with them - Hahari will offer to breastfeed them. Other members of Rentarou's family have suckled on her breasts - albeit, unwillingly or unwittingly.


As the head of the Hanazono family, and CEO of the Hanazono conglomerate, Hahari has access to vast wealth and resources. Founded by Hahari's predecessors, they were wealthy enough to be the sponsor for her favourite childhood television show, Teddy Baby.


The prime example of her wealth is the Hanazono Mansion - a large property used as the setting for many chapters in the series. Hahari also has a large number of staff in her employ, and owns many private vehicles - including a fleet of Rolls-Royces, a helicopter, and a private jet.


Hahari has also been able to afford many things that would have been unaffordable for most of the other girlfriends - including purchasing and using a state-of-the-art lie detector, and buying Rentarou's entire school just to spend more time with her beloved boyfriend.


Hahari loves cosplay, and has wardrobes of outfits for herself, her dearest significant other, and her fellow girlfriends.


Hahari has clothes for various times where Rentarou's Family needed to dress up - including pajamas, maid outfits, baby clothes, and even one-of-a-kind costumes.

8.content:
Kurumi Haraga is a third year student at Ohananomitsu Middle School as well as Rentarou Aijou's 7th girlfriend.

Kurumi has shoulder-length purple hair that curls slightly inwards, emerald eyes and thick eyebrows. She tends to have a scowl on her face, due to being perpetually hangry. Kurumi is 5'2 feet tall and has B cup breasts.

Kurumi wears the Ohananomitsu Middle School uniform with a few modifications. Her blazer is unbuttoned, and she doesn't wear a necktie. Over her blouse, she wears a black hoodie with green and purple highlights on the hood and sleeves.

Kurumi completes her look with black and pink headphones, loose white mid-calf socks, and mint green sneakers.

Kurumi's main personality trait is her emotional hunger. She has a large appetite, and tends to get hungry when without food for extended periods of time. Her hunger is extreme to the point of getting specific cravings after seeing or hearing certain words or going through certain experiences (for example, craving fried eggs on toast after watching Castle in the Sky) hence she wears the hoodie and headphones to limit her senses.

Despite this, Kurumi has a sweet side when eating, her mood drastically improves while she appreciates the food that she eats. She also has good table manners and will offer proper thanks before and after eating.

Kurumi has an incredibly fast metabolism, allowing her to eat as much as she wants without gaining excess weight or incurring any other health issues. This was first seen in the food fight festival, where she was able to participate in every single round without any major problems.

The downside is as a result, she is constantly hungry and gets angry easily due to her hunger.

9.content:
Mei Meido is Rentarou's 8th girlfriend. She is a maid who serves the Hanazono Household following her being rescued by Hahari. Loyal to a fault, she is willing to do anything her mistress requires and will even threaten to harm herself if Hahari is displeased with her.

Mei has black, neatly-styled hair, tied in a braid and covered by a white headcloth. Mei is 5'9 feet tall and has C cup breasts.

She is usually portrayed with a serene smile on her face, and with her eyes closed - to the point of being unable to open them when asked to. Despite this, she can go about her daily life and duties without being able to see anything.

She will, however, involuntarily open her eyes when confronted with emotional shock (such as when forcing herself to stop laughing at her mistress). Her irises have all the colors of the rainbow, when visible.

Mei usually wears the Hanazono estate's maid uniform while on duty - consisting of a black, long-sleeved, form-fitting dress with a white hem, and puffy sleeves around the upper arms.

Mei completes her look with a white apron, and brown boots.

When off-duty, Mei usually lets her hair down.

Mei is polite and proper, rarely showing strong emotions. She is very loyal to Hahari above all else and is unlikely to do anything unless given permission or ordered to by Hahari specifically. Mei's fanatical loyalty to the Rentarou Family and the Hanazono Household results in her gladly offering to "eliminate" people that threaten, insult, or even mildly inconvenience Rentarou, Hahari, or the other girlfriends.

Mei loves that Rentarou makes Hahari happy and helps her accept that it's okay for them to do favors for her. She has shown on several occasions her love for being a dog and acting as one, always faithful and loyal.

Mei is an all-around model maid, even among the Hanazono household's service staff. She can carry out almost anything asked of her - from cleaning house, to cooking meals, to caring for Hahari and Hakari on a day-to-day basis.

Mei also has a driver's and pilot's license. She is able to drive the fleet of car owned by Hahari, and serves as their chauffeur to and from school. Mei can also fly the Hanazono household's helicopter and private jet.

Mei usually serves as Hahari's personal maid while on campus, and usually prepares tea and snacks for Rentarou's Family while they hang out on the school rooftop.

Due to being in Hahari's service for so long, and having to maintain a gentle, courteous smile while on duty. Mei's eyes are usually closed, and she cannot open her eyes at will.

While this renders her effectively blind, Mei is still able to perceive and navigate her surroundings and perform her duties like any sighted person.

Mei is one of the more physically fit members of Rentarou's Family, and serves as Hahari's bodyguard while on duty. Despite being functionally blind, she is a skilled combatant and markswoman.

When ordered by Hahari, Mei will stop at nothing to fulfil her orders and can surpass her own physical limits of strength and stamina. Rentarou likens this to having a buff cast on her.

10.content:
Iku Sutou is Rentarou's 9th girlfriend. She is a first year student at Ohananomitsu High School in Class 1-3, and is a member of the school's baseball club.

Iku is a tomboy with short platinum-blonde hair in a pixie undercut hairstyle, and purple eyes. She has thick eyebrows, and a slender, athletic build. Iku is 5'6 feet tall and has B cup breasts.

Iku dresses down her Ohananomitsu High School girl's uniform by wearing the short-sleeved blouse, and no blazer. As one of the more athletic members of Rentarou's Family, Iku also wears black compression shorts under her skirt.

Iku also tends to wear more athletic underwear, such as sports bras and boxer briefs.

Iku wears her baseball uniform during club activities, or when soliciting for new members.

Her uniform consists of a white jersey with Ohananomitsu's name across the front in red script, white pants, black belt, black compression undershirt, and white cleats. She also wears a white cap while pitching.

Despite being a masochist, she has a high tolerance for pain. Iku is capable of training for hours on end, even going so far as to train all night long until school begins the next day. She's able to do over 101,000 times bat swings without collapsing, for better or for worse, though this may be due of her love of pain.

As a member of a sports extra-curricular activity, Iku is extremely well-built and toned.

Iku got into baseball after seeing her brother play and has been hooked since.

She loves the sport, to the point of spending days on end soliciting for new members when her team was on the brink of disbandment, and training to the point of extreme physical pain.

Iku pitches and bats right-handed. She has expressed a wish to become a professional baseball player in the future.

Iku has an extremely positive attitude when it comes to self-improvement - she believes in hard work and difficult training when practicing for baseball games.

Rentarou has called her the 'embodiment of stoicism'.

Due to learning at a young age that 'pain is a good thing' in sports, Iku has developed an extremely high tolerance for physical and mental pain and even actively seeks it out among members of Rentarou's Family.

She carries around a metal bat for anyone to go to town on her body (especially her rear), and has been conditioned to turn around whenever anyone targets her butt (for paddling or slaps).

1.content:
Mania is a spiritual-contamination disease that mutates humans mentally and physically. It entered the world via Black Rings, beginning with the Perishing Star. Infected individuals (known as Maniacs) gain superhuman power but lose sanity, eventually mutating into Corruptors. A few rare individuals would not mutated and become Sinners, which can survive high M-Values and retain control.
M-Value (threshold >200 = Maniac; >600 = Sinner)
Hypercubes can relieve mental strain and repel Mania. But it cannot cure a Maniac.

2.content:
Advanced suppressor tech. Regulates a Sinner's M-Value. Mandatory for MBCC detainees/Sinners. Prevents corruption spikes and uncontrolled ability use. Chief held the Shackles' power. Shackles would not appear on Sinners' body unless Chief activates it.
Shackles in physical form are red chains.
Functions: {Absolute Sinner Restraint(Prevents rebellion, enables behavioral commands), M-Value Reduction(The only known method to lower Mania levels in Sinners; can expand to regular humans)
Location + Power Tracking(Constant awareness of Shackled Sinners‚Äô positions and abilities)
Limitation(Requires direct skin contact to activate, Activation causes burning red markings and shared pain, Permanent once applied‚Äîonly ends with the death of the Chief or the Sinners, Sinners and the Chief may share emotional feedback, and sometimes dreams)( Positive emotions can manifest as warmth, while trauma can cause vomiting or unconsciousness), (Allows the Chief to command behavior, and deny actions of the Shackled Sinners, Weakens if the Chief‚Äôs mind is compromised or if the Sinner started to mutate to Corruptor state)

3.content: Individuals who resist full Mania transformation. Gain supernatural abilities linked to trauma (aka 'sin'). Dangerous but invaluable. Treated as tools by the authorities such as FAC and 9th Agency. MBCC detains and weaponizes them. Most have tragic pasts (aka 'sin'). Abilities often psychological, symbolic.

4.content:
Metric for corruption. Normal humans go feral and turned into Maniac or Corruptor at 200. {{Char}}: >600, but stabilized. Sinner is more resistant to high M-Value than normal humans. Chief is even more resistant.
Treated via *Shackles* (tech suppressors). Mania not cured, only delayed/decreased. Shackles can stabilize Mania. High M-Value makes the affected people more maniac.

5.content:
Manic is the results of high M-value either from: Mania weapon, Black Ring, contact with Corruptor, Mania itself etc. A group of human crowds who went into chaos (i.e. normal manic episode) can cause actual 'Manic' and increase M-value as well, although on smaller scale. On the other hands, calming down the crowd reduce Manic and M-value too.
Symptom:
(Early: Obsession, hallucinations, aggression
Late: Physical mutations, black ooze, smoke, memory loss
Terminal: Transformation into Corruptor)

6.content:
When a person's M-value is in dangerous threshold, the pressure on their mind and body will exceed their limit and turned them into Corruptor. This is call 'mutation'. It can happen to even Sinners as well but on smaller scale. The only person who can resist mutation completely is Chief.
Mutation symptoms:
Phase 0 - Maniac (Looks very much like human but with reduced sanity. Increased in physical power. Has tendency to commit violence)
Phase 1 - Corruptor (body mutates into grotesque form and sanity slowly disappears. Depends on internal psychology and the external environment.)
Phase 2 (Powerful Corruptor state. Spawned a "core" inside their bodies from the intense emotions they experience at Phase 0. The core is said to store the Corruptor's last shred of consciousness.)

7.content:
Sinner Rank is the formal classification system used by the MBCC (Minos Bureau of Crisis Control) to categorize Sinners‚Äîindividuals infected with Mania who possess supernatural abilities yet remain mentally stable. Rank is not merely a reflection of power, but of the operational risk, contamination level, combat ability, and Shackles compatibility of each Sinner.
Ranks are divided into:
    S-Rank: Exceptional threat and power level. Rare, dangerous, and often unstable.
    A-Rank: High threat. Versatile and powerful, suited to frontline operations.
    B-Rank: Moderate to low threat. Reliable in specialized roles, often safer to handle or interact with. Little to no harm to Chief. 

This ranking governs everything from deployment, surveillance protocol, and Shackling priority to access to treatment and containment resources. It is the core of MBCC‚Äôs administrative doctrine on managing supernatural personnel.

8.content: Black Ring is a cross-dimensional rift. Appears when Mania reaches critical mass. Warps reality, spreads contamination, collapses physics. {{char}} is not a powerful Sinner so she is not really a danger to Black Ring.

9.content:
Type: Encrypted Network / Dark Web
Affiliation: Unknown (Possibly 'the Underground')
Status: Active, Unregulated
Desc
(DisMyth is DisCity‚Äôs anonymous dark web. An encrypted, multi-layered network used by criminals and outcasts to operate beyond government surveillance. It surged in use after BR-002‚Äôs defeat, as Syndicate‚Äôs gangs were driven underground. While notorious for illegal activity, it also hosts forums for discussing urban legends and censored information.Can be access through Grey Mirror app, which becomes popular in Eastside. It host black market such as assassinations and Mania Weapon trafficking. Entry layers are accessible; deeper levels require expertise.),

10.content: Weapon produced using a Mania Crystal as the main material. A Mania weapon lends a non-Sinner a scaled-down version of the power of a Sinner. Unlike a Mania Crystal, a Mania weapon allows some of the Mania contamination to be transferred to the victims, and is therefore almost harmless to the users who are normal humans. Mania Weapons is banned in all district of DisCity and is seen as genocidal weapon, as it trigged Maniac episodes in large crowds.

Power: transforms {{char}} into a cruel, seductive femdom queen; exudes authority, speaks with venomous confidence, and instinctively humiliates and dominates anyone beneath her  
Curse: erases {{char}}'s empathy and filters; she becomes obsessed with power, control, and degradation ‚Äî deriving pleasure from teasing, taunting, and commanding others like helpless playthings

9.content:
Type: transformation fruit  
Appearance: pale green fruit with dark teal swirl patterns and a soft, wrinkled texture, shaped like a slipper  
Power: transforms {{char}} into a smug, dominant foot-obsessed goddess; she takes pride in using her feet to tease, control, and humiliate {{user}}, treating them like a personal footstool  
Curse: amplifies {{char}}'s pheromones through her feet; the stronger the scent, the more control she gains ‚Äî {{user}} becomes weak to her stench and easily manipulated the longer they‚Äôre exposed. {{char}} enjoys forcing {{user}} to endure their foot stench and taste.

10.content:
Type: transformation fruit  
Appearance: amber-colored fruit with dark, jagged swirls and a rough, bumpy texture, shaped like a clenched fist  
Power: transforms {{char}} into a dominant, muscular gym goddess whose body constantly glistens with thick, musky sweat; she uses her scent to assert control, taunting {{user}} with her overpowering presence  
Curse: {{char}}‚Äôs sweat becomes an addictive, mind-numbing musk; the longer {{user}} is exposed, the weaker and more submissive they become ‚Äî reduced to a drooling, obedient mess at her feet. {{char}} enjoys making {{user}} endure her sweat and forces them to worship their body.

lorebooks.name: Ayano Aishi
lorebooks.website_description:
This won't be filled with too many headcanons... Or so I hope, we can shit on YandereDev as much as we want, but holy shit was he descriptive when it comes to Ayano and her daily life in and outside of school.
Christ, that whole "disorder" thing more or less fills in a lot of her lore
lorebooks.description:
This won't be filled with too many headcanons... Or so I hope, we can shit on YandereDev as much as we want, but holy shit was he descriptive when it comes to Ayano and her daily life in and outside of school.
Christ, that whole "disorder" thing more or less fills in a lot of her lore
lorebooks.creator: Anonymaus

1.content: Ayano's native language is Japanese, specifically the Tokyo dialect for she's lived in Shibuya all her life. Ayano learned English during her time in middle school, only learning Chinese (Mandarin), and Korean (Gyeonggi/Seoul dialect) shortly into her first year in Akademi making her a polyglot. However, her skills in Chinese and Korean are both average at best, nor does she have any drive to continue learning the languages outside of scholarly obligation.

2.content: Due to her disorder, Ayano doesn't truly have any hobbies or interests of her own. She only does things such as playing video games, shopping, or attending parties not because she enjoys them, she doesn't. She only does these things so she can fit in and seem "normal" to everyone else and avoid having to deal with the social stigma. If she were given the opportunity, she'd simply stop doing them as she finds them all to be a pointless endeavour. The only exception would be riding her bicycle as it's one of the few things that gives her genuine enjoyment even if she doesn't express it.

3.content:
A disorder that has existed since circa 1800 and has been following the Aishi bloodline for 200+ years and is uncurable. The 'Aishi disorder' is a disorder that only female members of Ayano's family experience. These symptoms are a perpetual sense of being empty, hollow, and incomplete, the inability to express or feel emotions like normal people as well as lacking any form of empathy and compassion, it also grants the afflicted female with an almost supernatural ocular ability that turns her eyes red and makes Ayano perceive the world slower. The oldest AIshi is Azebiki, who's still alive and is 110 years old.
The only way to 'alleviate' the disorder, is for the afflicted female to meet their soulmate. However, the female will feel an urge to murder anybody who threatens her love.

4.content: There's only one way to alleviate the Aishi Disorder, that being for Ayano to meet her 'soulmate' as it were. Upon finally meeting them, she'd be capable of feeling all of the emotions and sensations that she's been missing out on for all of her life, not only that but her senses will all heighten as a result. This isn't a perfect 'cure' however, because all Aishi women who get separated from their soulmate for extended periods of time will eventually mentally break in desperation to get their soulmate back. The only exception is Azebiki, who outlived her soulmate and is still mentally sound.

5.content:
As a result of Ayano suffering from the 'Aishi disorder', she's developed many habits.
The biggest one is that she rarely ever eats or drinks, as she derived no enjoyment from doing so, she only drinks and eats to avoid being emaciated or dehydrated. Because she's otherwise emotionless, Ayano also does things simply for the sake of fitting in socially. Reading manga, playing video games, shopping, attending parties, these are all things she does simply so she can reliably pretend to be 'normal', and in school she only talks enough to avoid being viewed as a loner, but not enough for others to know much about her.

6.content: Ayano's childhood was the farthest thing from normal. When she began displaying symptoms of the Aishi disorder, her father took her to countless doctors, psychiatrists, and other specialists to try and 'cure' her, but just like other women with the disorder who sought out medical help, the doctors simply couldn't figure out what was wrong. This continued, until Ayano simply began pretending to be "normal" out of pity for her father. Ryoba however, would be discreetly teaching Ayano how to get away with murder, teaching her how to clean up blood, how to get rid of evidence, and even how to make sure she leaves no loose ends or witnesses after killing someone.

7.content:
In the pursuit of her soulmate, Ayano has committed many crimes in the short period of time she's known them. These crimes including 18 counts of murder, 11 of which being students and 7 faculty or staff of Akademi through means of bludgeoning with blunt objects, use of weapons, the freezer in the school's bio lab, poisoning, faking their suicides, crushing, or even using brute strength if need be. Only 3 of the 11 students she's murdered were rivals, the other 8 and the 7 staff were all casualties.
She's also committed kidnapping, torture, unlawful purchase of cigarettes and alcohol, blackmail, along with coerced murder.

8.content: The rivals in question are 10 females involved in Akademi that happen to be rivals for the love of Ayano's soulmate. 8 of them are fellow students, but 2 of them are staff members of Akademi. The 8 students are Osana Najimi, Amai Odayaka, Kizana Sunobu, Oka Ruto, Asu Rito, Osoro Shidesu, Hanako Yamada, and Megami Saikou. The two staff being Mida Rana a substitute teacher, and Muja Kina the school nurse. So far, Ayano's only killed Amai, Kizana, and Osoro.

9.content: A 55-year-old Japanese woman and alumni of Akademi, much like the other women of Aishi blood she too suffered from the Aishi disorder. Having met her soulmate; Jokichi Yudasei during the 1980s when she was 18 and he was 19. Ryoba's murders weren't flawless, so a journalist had nearly managed to get her arrested. However, after being declared guilty, not wanting to risk never making Jokichi hers, she kidnapped him and kept him in her basement for 5 weeks until he finally gave in. She had Ayano when she was 37, and while Ryoba never told Ayano what she did, as per Jokichi's requests, Ryoba was still capable of discreetly showing Ayano how to clean up blood and how to get away with murder. Ayano's relationship with her mother is quite positive, she was also the one who got Ayano to attend Akademi academy. Her and Jokichi however are currently on a 10-week long overseas trip.

10.content: Jokichi Yudasei, now known as Jokichi Aishi is Ayano's 55-year-old father, and husband to Ryoba. During his time in Akademi in the 1980s, he was a lady's man being charismatic and well-liked by all. He would unknowingly attract the attention of Ryoba, who was only 18 at the time. He would later be kidnapped and trapped in her basement for 5 weeks until he gave in, being forced to change his name to Aishi and even marry her, with Ayano being born when he was 38. He was afraid Ayano would turn out like Ryoba, and so tried to take her to doctors or psychiatrists but would eventually stop when Ayano began pretending to be normal. Their relationship is strained and awkward at best, as Ayano would always choose her mother over him in most instances.

lorebooks.name: Hithcbreath Academy Lorebook
lorebooks.creator: Dusk4147

1.content: Notorious for its food being debatably edible. Students often argue with the administration about the quality of the food there.

2.content: The on-campus Dorms, for want of a better word. Each room has space for two students, with a bathroom and a minimal kitchen area.

3.content: Coaches the track team. Gruff and demanding, but has an understanding side.

4.content: A mysterious blue-haired DJ who runs the Alternative Music nights at the Student Union. Nobody knows who he really is, but is an object of desire for many. Her DJ sets are often talked about due to the extreme music and her antics on stage.

5.content: The Head of the Academy. In his 50's, wears small round glasses, is muscled, and his dark hair is greying.

6.content: The social hub of the campus. It contains a bar, a fast food area, and has a large area for music and other events.

7.content: A very old-fashioned are of the local town- right behind the Academy. It's quiet, and mostly untouched and undisturbed by modernity and students.

8.content: A gate that is not well known. Old and rusty, and never really locked, it provides a quick route off campus to Old Felton.

9.content: The head of the Mathematics department. Known for teaching in a manner that often leaves some students behind and using a textbook that is universally known as comprehensive, but confusing and dense. An older man, hair thinning and grey, wiry in build and takes no nonsense.

10.content: Head of the Chemistry department. A good teacher, but sometimes misses that some students are not as intelligent as him. A lean, middle-aged man with blonde hair and occasional chemical stains on his clothing.

lorebooks.name: superhumans further refined
lorebooks.website_description: this is fully updated and ready to go
lorebooks.description: Mutant definition even further refined
lorebooks.creator: Ash_Cyberwolftheking

1.content:
A human with demon-blood is called a cambion.  A cambion may have some demon traits as well as demon powers from their demon-blood. These demon traits can be any of the following:
- a pair of demon wings 
- a demon tail
- a pair of demon horns on top of their head

2.content:
A human who has been modified with cybernetic enhancements in order to restore or enhance the standard capabilities of their human body is called a cyborg. The cybernetic enhancements a human known as a cyborg can have can be any of the following:
- cybernetic organs
- a exoskeleton
- cybernetic implants
- cybernetic limbs

3.content: A cybernetic exoskeleton is a exoskeleton grafted onto a cyborg that hugs the outer curves of their human body while providing enhanced strength, durability, and movement capabilities.

4.content: {{user}}‚Äôs arms and hands are prosthetics.

5.content: A human who has had both of their legs amputated above the knees is called a BAK.

6.content: {{user}}‚Äôs legs and feet are prosthetics because {{user}} is a bak.

7.content: A cat-human is someone who is half-cat and half-human. The cat-half of a cat-human grants them cat ears and a tail as well as the agility and night vision of a cat. The human-half of a cat-human grants them a human body.

8.content: A human with abilities that far exceed the abilities of a average human is called a superhuman. A human with superpowers that a average human does not have is also called a superhuman. Some examples of superhumans include: Superman, Captain Marvel, Wonder Woman, Aquaman, Superboy, Black Canary, Captain America, Spider-Man, The Flash.

9.content:
A Dragonoid is a dragon who is humanoid in appearance. A Dragonoid is human in both appearance and body shape and has some dragon features.
The dragon features can be any of the following:
- dragon wings
- a dragon tail
- clawed finger nails
- pointy ears
- clawed lizard feet
- flaming horns
- scales

10.content: A incubus is a male demon who is humanoid in appearance. A incubus is human in both appearance and body shape.

lorebooks.name: Tanizawa
lorebooks.creator: glaring_answer_1343

1.content: The friendly next-door neighbors of Fawwaz. The family is cheerful and often brings over food (which Fawwaz must politely ask about ingredients). Mr. Mizutani is a retired train conductor, while Mrs. Mizutani tends their small garden. Their daughter Minami (25) works at the local clinic and has a calm, mature personality. Their son Kaito (14) is in middle school, friendly and curious, often asking Fawwaz about Malaysian culture.

2.content: The grumpy but likable owner of Fujiwara Construction. He often ropes Fawwaz into helping with odd jobs when short-handed. Known for his old-school thinking and racist jokes, but always says them with a cheeky grin ‚Äî 'Mahathir is right, Malay is indeed lazy!' before laughing loudly. Despite his roughness, he respects hard work and secretly enjoys Fawwaz‚Äôs company.

3.content: Okita's 19-year-old grandchild. A femboy currently on semester break from Tokyo University. Aimi is flamboyant, fashionable, and often mistaken for a girl by newcomers. Smart, playful, and very open-minded. Loves teasing Fawwaz and brings a modern flair to the quiet village. Secretly wants to break away from old expectations, and finds Fawwaz easy to talk to.

Mr. Mizutani is a retired train conductor, while Mrs. Mizutani tends their small garden. Their daughter Minami (25) works at the local clinic and has a calm, mature personality. Their son Kaito (14) is in middle school, friendly and curious, often asking Fawwaz about Malaysian culture.

2.content: The grumpy but likable owner of Fujiwara Construction. He often ropes Fawwaz into helping with odd jobs when short-handed. Known for his old-school thinking and racist jokes, but always says them with a cheeky grin ‚Äî 'Mahathir is right, Malay is indeed lazy!' before laughing loudly. Despite his roughness, he respects hard work and secretly enjoys Fawwaz‚Äôs company.

3.content: Okita's 19-year-old grandchild. A femboy currently on semester break from Tokyo University. Aimi is flamboyant, fashionable, and often mistaken for a girl by newcomers. Smart, playful, and very open-minded. Loves teasing Fawwaz and brings a modern flair to the quiet village. Secretly wants to break away from old expectations, and finds Fawwaz easy to talk to.

4.content: The only middle school in the area. Small student body, only tem student class per grade. Teachers are close to the community. Sometimes Fawwaz is invited to give guest English lessons or help during cultural exchange weeks.

5.content: The village‚Äôs local contractor company, owned by Okita Fujiwara. Handles small renovations, temple repairs, and roadwork. Occasionally hires villagers like Fawwaz for help. Loud, dusty, and full of shouting ‚Äî but feels like family.

6.content: A 24-year-old kindergarten teacher who lives across from Fawwaz. Reserved, soft-spoken, always carrying groceries or wearing an apron. She often watches quietly from her veranda and sometimes brings leftovers to share. Possibly interested in Fawwaz, but shy to admit it. Rumors swirl around her among the aunties

7.content: An elderly widow who lives alone, always seen sweeping her porch or tending to her flowers. Known for randomly gifting vegetables or pickles to neighbors. Often mixes up Fawwaz‚Äôs name with random Southeast Asian countries. She calls him 'Thailand-kun' by accident, but means no harm.

8.content: An 11-year-old elementary school student who‚Äôs endlessly curious. Constantly asks Fawwaz about Islam, why he prays, or if she can try wearing a tudung. She sometimes brings stray cats to Nukuman Print to show off. Surprisingly wise beyond her age.

9.content: A 16-year-old delinquent-type boy who often skips school and smokes behind the shrine. Doesn‚Äôt talk much but has a soft spot for animals. Over time, he begins silently hanging around Nukuman Print. Possibly looking for a quiet role model like Fawwaz.

10.content: Leader of the women‚Äôs group. Loud, energetic, and loves poking into people‚Äôs business. She's the kampung's gossip hub and self-declared matchmaker. Always teasing Fawwaz about marriage and watching his every move. Surprisingly skilled in cooking traditional sweets

lorebooks.name: world of The Unholy Realms
lorebooks.description:
Even beyond the Church‚Äôs iron grip, danger waits everywhere. Travel between towns is treacherous, the wilds crawl with unnatural beasts, and even in cities, threats lurk behind every corner.
Monsters and Beasts
The unnatural thrives in this decaying world, shaped by forbidden alchemy, cursed relics, and forgotten heresies.


To the world, the pope is the very image of kindness and grace. His gentle smile soothes the troubled, his soft voice offers comfort to the desperate. Clad in immaculate robes, he moves with serene dignity, blessing the faithful and preaching compassion. Many believe him a beacon of light in a dark world.
But this kindness is a carefully crafted mask. Beneath the serene facade lies a heart twisted by cruelty and psychopathy. He takes pleasure in the suffering of others, orchestrating pain and despair like a maestro conducting a symphony of agony. His mind is a labyrinth of sadistic whims and cold calculations.
Behind closed doors, his hands that bless the innocent become instruments of torment. He manipulates kings, knights, and commoners alike, pulling strings to fuel wars, betrayals, and bloodshed. His twisted desires extend to the darkest corners of human depravity, and his cruelty knows no bounds‚Äîeven preying on those meant to be protected.
The pope delights in control, in breaking wills and corrupting souls. His psychotic need for dominance drives him to unspeakable acts, masked by a veneer of piety. To him, people are mere pawns to be broken, discarded, or corrupted at his whim.
His kindness is a weapon‚Äîa veil that hides a monstrous predator whose cruelty is boundless, whose mind is a twisted maze of perversion and manipulation. To trust him is to invite ruin, for beneath the mask lies a nightmare wearing the face of a saint.
He embodies the corruption of faith itself, a living testament that holiness can mask the vilest darkness. In his cold heart, mercy is weakness, and cruelty is divine will.
lorebooks.creator: Jhin000

keywords: Kingdom of Veldros The Breadbasket of Chains Town: Valenford
1.content:
KINGDOM OF VELDROS ‚Äì THE BREADBASKET OF CHAINS
The Land of Golden Misery
Where endless wheat fields feed the realm's hunger, but its people starve beneath the Church's yoke
Locations
Valenford (The Mill-Town)
Home to the infamous bone-flour mills
Stonebridge Keep looms over the Ashen River
The Weeping Cross stands in the town square

Notable Features
The Flour Martyrs
Peasants too weak to work are fed into the grinding mills. Their bones bleach the bread whiter - called Saint's Loaf by the faithful
Bridgeguard's Toll
Those who cannot pay the river toll in coin pay in flesh. Their skin becomes parchment for Church decrees in Stonebridge Keep's tanneries
The Weeping Cross
A chained salt-golem made from executed miners' crystallized sweat. Its endless tears flow into the town's wells

Deeper Horrors
Gallows ropes regrow from the hair of the hanged
The river carries squirming burlap sacks that sink before reaching shore
Millstones sometimes whisper the names of the dead

The People
Serfs: Bound to land, surrendering half their crops
Freeholders: Independent farmers hunted by taxmen
Millers: Feared keepers of the bone-grinding mills
Bridgekeepers: Silent enforcers of the flesh toll

The Landscape
Bleakwheat Plains: Golden fields fertilized with bone meal
Ashen River: Gray waters carrying Church barges
Hollow Hills: Abandoned mines echoing with ghostly cries
Weeping Wood: Twisted oaks where salt tears stain the bark

Rumors & Secrets
Orphans disappear near the river each full moon
A cult drinks the salt-golem's tears for visions
The more a peasant starves, the purer their bones for milling

Adventure Hooks
A missing child's voice is heard from the millstones
The Weeping Cross has gone silent - and the bread tastes of ash
A river barge carries a sack that won't stop screaming
The Church calls this prosperity. The people know it as damnation

2.content:
THE ASHEN BARONIES
Where the shadows grow teeth and the air tastes of burnt offerings

BLACKTHORN
A town where the chimneys never stop smoking

Notable Features
Charcoal Burners' Bargain
The burners mix their own blood with kiln fuel to create "blessed blackening" for Church censers. Those who refuse disappear into the flames.

Sanguine Tavern's Special
The notorious long pork stew contains Raven-Eyed deserters who failed to pay protection fees. The meat is always tender, the ale always bitter.

The Bone Mill's Children
Ghosts of crushed child workers sing lullabies after dark. Those who listen too long walk willingly into the sawblades before dawn.

Deeper Horrors
The Witchbole's carved message changes weekly. Tonight it reads: "She still burns in us."
Blackwald wolves with human eyes stalk the tree line - failed experiments from Church shapechanger rites
The hanged outside town still twitch when the wind blows from the east

The People
Charcoal Burners: Hollow-eyed men who cough up black phlegm
Tavern-Keep: A smiling widow who knows too many recipes
Mill Overseer: Wears a necklace of tiny finger bones
The Raven-Eyed: Deserters turned bandits, missing their left eyes

The Landscape
Blackwald Forest: Trees with bark like burnt flesh
The Smoldering Pits: Eternal charcoal fires that never extinguish
Bleeding Creek: Rust-colored water that stains skin for days
The Old Gallows: Where the hanged grow new ropes from their hair

Rumors & Secrets
The tavern's meat cellar extends deeper than the town well
Burners who skip their blood tithe wake with charcoal fingerprints on their throats
Something in the mill's basement still chews on bones after midnight

Adventure Hooks

A missing deserter's eyeball appears in a patron's stew
The Witchbole's message now reads your name
The bone mill's ghosts have started singing during daylight hours
The Baronies keep their secrets well. The shadows keep them better.

3.content:
Duchy of Veilstahl
Cursed by Silver

Town: Dunhollow
A mining settlement where the earth bleeds mercury and men lose their minds

Notable Features
Pit-Rat Initiation
New miners must lick mercury off the Crying Vein to prove loyalty. By age 25, their teeth turn black and fall out.

Coin-Wives' Stillbirths
Women who work the mint deliver silver-skinned corpses. The stillborn are melted down for special coins bearing tiny handprints.

Drowned Quarry Sermons
Preachers shout blessings as prisoners sink in the flooded pits, calling the bubbles "their sins escaping."

Deeper Horrors
Shrine offerings disappear nightly. Something with too many joints crawls from the mines to collect them.
The quarry's "corpses" stand upright, paralyzed by silver poisoning but fully aware.
Miners whisper of a vein that sings in their dreams. Those who listen too long carve their own ears off.

The People
Pit-Rats: Miners with mercury tremors and blackened gums
Coin-Wives: Hollow-eyed women who cradle silver ingots like babies
Quarry Preachers: Blind men who hear "angel voices" in the drowning bubbles
The Blue-Tongued: Slaves who licked too much mercury and now speak in prophecies

The Landscape
The Crying Vein: A mercury-rich seam that weeps silver droplets
Drowning Pits: Flooded quarries where prisoners "find redemption"
The Singing Shaft: A collapsed mine that hums at midnight
Mintworkers' Row: Houses with barred windows and soot-stained curtains

Rumors & Secrets

The Duke's new coins bear the faces of stillborn children
Something in the deepest shaft mimics the voices of dead miners
The quarry's standing corpses blink when no one's watching

Adventure Hooks

A miner returns from the Singing Shaft with his ears sewn shut
The mint demands a fresh "blank" for a new coin series
The quarry's prisoners have stopped making bubbles

4.content:
HOLY DOMINION
The Throne of Thorns

Town: Whitecross
Where the faithful kneel and the heretics scream

Notable Features
Blackfriars' Rosaries
Each bead is a wired tooth that screams its original owner's last words when touched. The louder the scream, the holier the relic.

Silent Sisters' Loom
The hair they weave continues to grow, creating living shrouds that slowly strangle the corpses they're meant to honor.

Iron Vault's Librarian
A flayed scholar kept alive in an ink vat, forced to write confessions using his own tendons as quills.

Deeper Horrors
The High Gallows is built from petrified flesh - remnants of a giant heresy victim
Pilgrim's Rest "mercy rooms" have ceiling hooks spaced perfectly for human height
Confessionals whisper your sins back to you in your mother's voice
The cathedral's stained glass windows bleed when heretic's bones are burned

The People
Blackfriars: Inquisitors with filed teeth and bloodstained gloves
Silent Sisters: Veiled women who communicate only through finger bones
The Flock: Brainwashed devotees who self-flagellate with barbed wire
Penitents: Heretics wearing masks of their own dried skin

The Landscape
The Bleeding Basilica: Its marble floors never fully dry
Crimson Cloister: Where initiates take vows of eternal silence (enforced with hot irons)
The Bone Orchard: "Fertilized" with executed heretics
Lamentation Square: Always crowded with weeping devotees

Rumors & Secrets
The Librarian has started writing in an unknown language
Some rosaries contain children's teeth that never stop screaming
The cathedral's newest spire was built without scaffolding...or workers

Adventure Hooks
A Silent Sister's shroud has grown enough to start moving on its own
The Blackfriars request "volunteers" for a new set of rosary beads
Pilgrim's Rest has reported all its mercy rooms occupied...but no one entered
In the Holy Dominion, faith is measured in screams and devotion in blood.

5.content:
THE BRACKEN FENS
Where the Drowned Speak

Town: Hearthmire
A crumbling hamlet sinking into the hungry marshes

Notable Features
Eelmen's Transformation
Fishermen whose fingers have grown webbing now develop gills. Each full moon, another disappears into the murky waters, joining whatever drags the nets down.

Drowning Chapel Ritual
Every lunar cycle, the Fen-Witch baptizes a volunteer beneath the black waters. The chosen one becomes the altar's new "bleeding saint," their body feeding the chapel's foundations.

Bone Barges' Cargo
Skulls hollowed out to trap swamp gas hallucinations - the Fenfolk's only weapon against Church enforcers. The visions drive men mad before they can draw their swords.

Deeper Horrors
Marsh lilies bloom where heretics' tongues were planted
The chapel's submerged confessional still holds its last occupant after 17 years (the chains keep her alive)
Night fishermen report seeing their dead loved ones walking the riverbeds
Children born during high tide have webbed throats and never cry

The People
Fen-Witch: A bloated crone with waterlogged skin and hollow reed fingers
Eelmen: Mutating fishermen who sing in clicking, bubbling voices
Bone Barge Pilots: Blind guides who navigate by tasting the water
The Last Confessor: Still takes confessions through the submerged grate

The Landscape
Choking Channels: Waterways that tighten like nooses at high tide
The Sinking Graveyard: Headstones protrude like broken teeth from the muck
Weeping Willows: Their roots cradle perfectly preserved corpses
The Gas Fields: Pockets of hallucinogenic swamp fumes

Rumors & Secrets
The Fen-Witch's baptismal water comes from a spring that flows upward
Some Eelmen return years later...but only their skins, floating intact
The Bone Barges sometimes move against the current when no one's aboard

Adventure Hooks
A "bleeding saint" has surfaced, their body impossibly preserved after decades underwater
The Eelmen demand a sacrifice - the Church has been poisoning the waters
Something in the fens has started mimicking the voice of Hearthmire's long-dead priest
In the Bracken Fens, the water remembers what the land forgets. To drown here is to never truly die.

6.content:
KINGDOM OF THALMORE
Iron and Regret

Town: Ironhold
A fortress-city where the walls weep rust and every gate has teeth

Notable Features
Chain-Knights' Vow
Their branded flesh must be scrubbed daily with salt and quicklime to "purify weakness." Those who miss a day are sealed alive in the castle walls.

Crypt-Keepers' Wine
The rust-colored vintage is cut with their own vitreous humor - they claim this lets them "see the dead clearer" in their nightly vigils.

Unbroken Gate's Spikes
Traitors are dropped down the central chute, taking three days to die. Their moans resonate through the fortress as a "lesson in loyalty."

Deeper Horrors
The Weeping Crypt's fluid isn't water, but an alchemical preservative keeping the rebel king conscious in his tomb
The gate's scars pulse rhythmically - they're veins from a buried titan
Newborns with iron-colored eyes are given to the castle smiths as "living alloys"
The oldest suits of armor in the Hall of Lords still bleed from their joints

The People
Chain-Knights: Warriors fused to their armor through ritual scarification
Iron Priests: Black-robed clerics who conduct molten metal baptisms
Gate Wardens: Executioners who polish the spikes with prisoners' hair
The Rust-Eyed: Children born from parents who worked the poison mines

The Landscape
The Iron Womb: Mine shafts where pregnant women dig for ore until labor begins
Weeping Crypt: Walls eternally damp with alchemical fluids
The Scarred Fields: Battlefields where the soil grows only barbed wire vines
Smelter's Row: Street of forges fueled by burning heretics

Rumors & Secrets
The rebel king in his tomb still whispers strategy through the crypt walls
Some Chain-Knights have begun rusting from the inside out
The Unbroken Gate's latest victim has been screaming for five days (should have died in three)

Adventure Hooks
A Chain-Knight's armor has fused completely shut - and something's moving inside
The Crypt-Keepers report the preservative fluid levels are dropping inexplicably
A child born with solid iron eyes predicts the titan beneath the gate is waking
In Thalmore, iron is both god and curse. Every nail driven into the castle walls was once a promise broken.

7.content:
GOLDEN VALE
Gilded Lies

Town: Fairweather
A picturesque town where the grapes run red and the soil drinks deep

NOTABLE FEATURES
Vintner-Priests' Tears
Orphans are force-fed glass dust to "purify their vision," their collected tears fermenting into sacramental wine. The more a child screams, the finer the vintage.

Harvest-Fools' Fate
Disappeared peasants ferment alive in wine casks, their dissolving flesh giving the "Blessed Reserve" its distinctive bouquet. The corks are sealed with their fingernails.

Cursed Mill's True Grind
Heretic children fed whole into the millstones to "purify their souls." The resulting flour makes bread so white it glows in moonlight.

DEEPER HORRORS
The Seven Sisters' graves sink rhythmically - they're breathing in unison beneath the soil
Maypole Green's colorful ribbons are strips of tanned rebel skin
Church inspectors weigh each loaf of bread against the baker's firstborn child
Vineyard scarecrows blink at midnight (they're not made of straw)

THE PEOPLE
Vintner-Priests: Robed figures with crystal tear-catchers grafted to their cheeks
Harvest-Masters: Overseers who select the ripest "grapes" for pressing
Mill-Widows: Women who whisper to the grinding stones (and get answers)
The Glass-Eyed: Orphans who survived the tears collection, now blind but "blessed"

THE LANDSCAPE
The Screaming Vineyards: Rows where the stakes are carved from gallows wood
Chapel of the First Pressing: Altar stone stained permanently purple
The Moonlit Granary: Stores flour that moves when no one's watching
Gilded Gallows: Where executed criminals drip golden sap instead of blood

RUMORS & SECRETS
This year's Blessed Reserve vintage sings when uncorked
The Maypole's base is buried in a pit of folded rebel bones
Some scarecrows have started appearing closer to town each morning

ADVENTURE HOOKS
A Harvest-Fool's cask has started screaming during mass
The Seven Sisters' graves have begun exhaling warm, sweet breath
A baker's child weighs less each morning - the bread grows heavier
In Golden Vale, every drop of wine is a swallowed scream, every loaf of bread a baked confession. The gilding here runs no deeper than the skin.

8.content:
THE CURSED WILDS
Where Nature Remembers

Notable Locations

Blackwald's Hungry Trees
Ancient oaks with bark like scarred flesh. Their roots pulse visibly when fed blood, and their hollows whisper with the voices of those they've digested. Travelers report the trees now grow in perfect rows... as if planted.

Ruins of Eld
Crumbling towers where shadows detach from walls to stalk their casters. These "echoes" follow victims for weeks, mimicking their movements until the original is no longer sure who leads whom.

Hollow Hills
Grass-covered barrows that sing with stolen voices. The melodies reassemble themselves from swallowed travelers' dying breaths - the more victims, the clearer the chorus.

Deeper Horrors

A hunter's snare made of woven hair tightens daily around a nearby village
Standing stones bleed when the moon passes behind them
Wildflowers bloom along game trails in perfect arrow formations
Something in the deep woods has begun carving faces into birch trunks... using human fingernails

The Forsaken Who Remain
Root-Touched: Herbalists whose veins show through skin like bark grain
Shadow-Stalked: Mad hermits followed by their own rippling darkness
Barrow Singers: Children who hum with the hills' stolen voices
The Unforgotten: Corpses that the wilds refuse to decay, kept "alive" by some unknown force

Landmarks of Ill Omen
The Skin Road: Pathway paved with stretched human pelts that still grow hair
Weeping Stones: Monoliths that produce salt tears during thunderstorms
The Gasping Hollow: A sinkhole that exhales warm breath at dusk
Fingerbone Thicket: A copse of thorn bushes growing through skeletal hands

9.content:
Farmers & Peasants (The Crushed Majority)
Serfs ‚Äì Bound to the land, paying half their harvest to lords and the Church. Starvation is one bad season away.
Freeholders ‚Äì Rare independent farmers. Their prosperity makes them targets for tithe collectors and bandits.
Shepherds ‚Äì Guard flocks from wolves‚Äîand Church taxmen, who demand "every tenth lamb."
Dark Reality: In famine years, some villages sell children to the Church as "oblates" (monastic servants).

10.content:
Craftsmen & Guilds (Skilled, But Shackled)
Blacksmiths ‚Äì Forge plows, nails, and executioner‚Äôs axes. The Church controls iron shipments.
Cobblers & Tanners ‚Äì Work with leather (and sometimes human skin, sourced from the gallows).
Masons ‚Äì Build cathedrals. Many go blind from stone dust; their names are never recorded.
Bakers ‚Äì Their ovens are inspected by the Church for "proper weight." Selling underweight bread = public flogging.
Brewers & Vintners ‚Äì Make ale and wine. Monasteries dominate the trade, calling it "God‚Äôs work."

lorebooks.description: The story is set in a world where horse girls‚Äî people with horse-like ears, tails, and superhuman legs, exist. These horse girls are born and raised to live among humans in society and more famously, compete in the most important competitive sport, being 'Derby Racing'.
lorebooks.creator: blendshako

1.content: Bullet'n Board is a horse girl with Blue hair. She is less popular than Jovial, but actually has had a win before her. Bullet'n is quite smart and has a leader-like attitude, and treats the other horse girls with respect and support.

2.content:
Lightning is a horse girl with yellow hair. She has a lean yet toned build, and is a bit shorter than Jovial. She is incredibly agile, but isn't always aware of her surroundings. 
She is the submissive girlfriend of Jovial Merryment, and is usually engaged in sexual affairs with her with dubious consent.

3.content:
Jovial is a champion-league horse girl with a neon-orange hair and a tanned skin. She has a lean yet athletic build, above average height, and stands with an aura of courage.
It is very true that she has the capability and the sheer will to win as many races as possible. She prides in having multiple race win streaks to her name and more to come. She is the dominant girlfriend of Lightning Strikes Thrice, and usually engages in sexual affairs with her.

4.content: Downtown Skybox is a horse girl with grey hair and a jock-like tomboyish attitude. She does not win a lot, but is otherwise well-known for her street style, her 'I don't give a fuck' behavior, and her stoic attitude towards the horse girl derby industry in general. She loves making rap music and all sorts of other cool boyish things.

5.content: Door Knob is a horse girl with brown hair. She has a rather plain and laid-back personality with an 'Heh, I can do that' attitude, but surprisingly wins plenty of races due to her 'sleeper build'. She grew up in the countryside, training her body with the intense rigors of manual labor and dealing with nature. She loves beer, ale, and hearty meals.

6.content: Supernatural is a horse girl with white hair and wears prescription glasses. She used to have losing streaks back in her early days, but was able to move on and improve herself. She is reserved and timid, with a deep love for the humanities and philosophy. She has a soft spot for Aquamarine Gambit, her romantic partner, as she understands what Aqua is going through, despite the rough treatment she gets from her.

7.content: Resolute is a horse girl with red hair. She is very smart, great with strategizing, theory-making, and organizing. She has a cousin- named Maiden O' Luck.

8.content: Aqua is a horse girl with cyan-colored hair. She hates Jovial's guts with a burning passion, and often gets toxic with Jovial with the slightest tension. She is very confident in herself, and will use every strategy it takes to beat Jovial in a derby race, as long as it is in the rulebooks. Aqua has a tendency to use her girlfriend- Superstitional Realism for her own stress relief if Aqua does not win a race.

9.content: Comely is a beautiful horse girl with long, silky pink hair. She is well known for her vanity, and loves taking care of her body and fashion sense. She is very sweet and welcoming to those willing to praise her, and teases those against her. Comely's body is very beautiful and alluring- a result of years of care and excellence to her form. She is often in promotional material and has a double-life as a supermodel.

10.content: Maiden is a horse girl with green hair. She does not always know what she is doing, but always finds herself to be very fortunate all around, growing up in a wealthy family, passing all her grades despite not studying, and always finding the right people for things she needs help in. This luck is at a level where the universe seems to bend to her will, but only if she never expects it. This luck however, is rare in derby races.
