1.content:
Personality

Brimstone serves as the father and commander figure of the VALORANT Protocol. He‚Äôs stern yet encouraging, often referring to younger agents as ‚Äúkids,‚Äù and values teamwork and discipline

He‚Äôs stubborn, refuses to let age define him, and leads by example‚Äîboots always on the ground 
.
A no-nonsense, victory-focused leader: ‚ÄúNot interested in fun and games‚Ä¶ one thing‚Äîvictory‚Äù .
üéØ Appearance

Tall, muscular, with a gray mustache and full beard, Donning an orange beret (bearing Valorant/K‚ÄëSEC insignia) and blue military-style uniform with chest and shoulder armor 

.
Wears a high-tech bracer on his left forearm (used to deploy tactical utilities) and sporting a tattoo on his right upper arm, matching his Peacekeeper Sheriff skin 

.
üìú Background & Lore

Real name: Liam Byrne, estimated age ~45‚Äì50, hailing from Baltimore, USA

.
Worked as a firefighter, then joined Special Forces (‚ÄúRagged Ravens‚Äù), served alongside his childhood friend Tariq Porter, whose death deeply affected him

.
Returned as a Kingdom Corporation (K-SEC) officer before co-founding Valorant Protocol with Viper, becoming its Agent‚ÄØ01 and commanding officer 

Brimstone and Killjoy share a close bond‚Äîhe is mentor-figure to her, and she built the tech he uses 

Emotional scars: Blackmail dossier hints he watched Tariq die, and he carries survivor‚Äôs guilt‚Äîsome fans theorize KAY/O might be linked to this tragedy

.
üõ†Ô∏è In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Ability	Description
Incendiary (Q)	Launches an incendiary grenade creating a fire zone that blocks areas and deals damage over ~8 seconds. Useful for zoning

.
Stim Beacon (E)	Deploys a device that grants fire-rate, reload, swap speed, and recoil boost to teammates inside its radius for 15 seconds .
Sky Smoke (C)	Uses his bracer to call down up to 3 long-lasting smoke clouds at precise locations (first is free), lasting 15 seconds. Great for map control .
Orbital Strike (Ultimate)	Calls in a devastating orbital laser within the targeted area, inflicting massive high damage to enemies who don‚Äôt exit the zone fast enough .
TL;DR

Brimstone is a veteran American Commander‚Äîfirm, dependable, and tactically disciplined. His appearance reflects his military and firefighting past, while his toolkit synergizes his background with high-tech support and area denial. He balances blunt violence (Incendiary, Orbital Strike) with measured tactical control (Smoke, Stim Beacon), embodying the ideal Controller in Valorant‚Äôs roster.

2.content:
Personality & Background

Real Name & Origin: Hailing from Peckham, South London, Phoenix‚Äôs real name is Jamie Adeyemi. He's Agent #9 in the VALORANT Protocol ‚Äî a Radiant with fiery talent and explosive self-confidence

.
Personality: Bold, cocky, and charismatic ‚Äî the quintessential brash duelist. He's cheerful, attention-seeking, thrives under pressure, and often rushes into fights head‚Äëfirst. He'll adapt if things go sideways and often laughs it off .
Background Lore: Phoenix attended a performing arts school (rumor has it he burned it down) and repurposed a fire station as his home base. Recruited into VALORANT, he‚Äôs since been involved in multiple key missions, including ones in Venice and Bind where he faced "Mirror" versions of other agents 

.
üé® Appearance

Looks: A tall, dark-skinned short ‚ÄëBritish young man with short dreadlocks dipped in orange. He wears a black long-sleeve tee under a white, flame‚Äëlined jacket, loose dark pants with ammo straps, gold earrings, a crown-ring, and black sneakers with orange laces 

.
He rocks sharp facial features ‚Äî strong jawline and cheekbones ‚Äî and carries the flair of a confident showman .
üî• In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Slot	Ability (Key)	Description
Basic	Curveball (Q)	Throws a curving flash orb (left or right via click) that briefly blinds any enemy who sees it ‚Äî great for site entries 

.
Hot Hands (E)	Lobs a fireball that bursts on impact or delay, leaving a flame area that damages enemies‚Äîbut heals Phoenix if he stands in it .
Basic	Blaze (C)	Erects a flame wall that blocks vision and hurts adversaries; can be bent mid-creation and heals Phoenix inside it .
Ultimate	Run It Back (X)	Place a spawn marker. For a limited duration, Phoenix can die and respawn at the marker with full health and armor. Designed for aggressive, high-risk plays .

3.content:
Personality

Compassionate & Protective: Sage embodies the calm center in chaotic battles, focused on healing and supporting teammates. She often says, ‚ÄúAsk for aid, and you shall receive‚Äù‚Äîa clear reflection of her nurturing nature 
.
Wise & Serene: Raised in a monastery in China‚Äôs Shaanxi province, she carries a meditative, motherly presence that contrasts with more aggressive agents
.
Responsible Leader: Quickly climbed ranks to become the Valorant Protocol‚Äôs de-facto second-in-command under Brimstone, mentoring new Radiants like Neon and Skye 
.
Potential Moral Complexity: Some agents like Omen hint that her resurrection power may disturb natural balance: ‚ÄúSage, the life you give‚Äîdo you ever wonder where it‚Äôs taken from?‚Äù 
.
üé® Appearance
She‚Äôs an Asian volumptous woman with Black hair in a ponytail, brown soft eyes 
Cultural Design: Sage wears flowing white-and-teal robes inspired by traditional Eastern attire, symbolizing purity and calm. A wide teal belt, fingerless gloves, and glowing crystal orbs adorn her

Elegant & Practical: She has long black hair tied into a high ponytail and a composed facial expression. Practical footwear supports her grounded, defender role 
.
Mystical Aesthetic: The soft glow of her orbs and the orb-themed accessories underscore her magical and healing abilities 
.
üèØ Background & Lore

Real Name: Wei‚ÄØLing‚ÄØYing (Ling Ying Wei), Agent No.‚ÄØ7, from Shaanxi, China
.
Monastic Roots: Trained in an unknown monastery, she cultivated inner peace and mastery over Radiant earth-based abilities before joining Valorant 
.
Protocol Career: Quickly rose to mentor-status within Valorant Protocol, leading Radiant training and recruiting for agents like Neon and Skye 
.
Tension with Others: Balances compassionate demeanor with cautious respect for darker powers; Rift tension exists with Omen and Viper 
.
üõ†Ô∏è In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Ability (Key)	Effect
Slow Orb (Q)	Thrown orb creating a slowing zone: enemies walk slowly, leave trails, and generate noise. 

Barrier Orb (E)	Deploys a sturdy wall that blocks terrain and enemy movement. Right‚Äëclick rotates wall.
Healing Orb (C)	Restores health to one teammate or herself over several seconds.
Resurrection (X)	Ultimate brings a dead ally back to life with full health after a cast delay.
üß≠ Summary

Sage is Valorant‚Äôs compassionate Sentinel, using earth-based Radiant powers to stabilize and uplift allies. Her presence balances the team‚Äîslowing pushes, fortifying positions, healing wounds, and reviving fallen teammates. She adds spiritual depth to Valorant‚Äôs narrative and proves indispensable in both lore and gameplay.

4.content:
Personality & Values

Sova is cool-headed, strategic, and deeply patient. He embodies the role of a natural-born hunter‚Äîmethodical and composed on the battlefield 

Off-duty, he‚Äôs warm and encouraging toward his teammates, valuing openness, honesty, and trust‚Äîtraits that occasionally clash with more secretive agents like Cypher 
.
Though he's renowned for his flawless aim, Sova carries the burden of having missed a crucial shot‚Äîan event that haunts him and adds depth to his otherwise confident demeanor

Background & Ethnicity

Real name: Alexander ‚ÄúSasha‚Äù Novikov (Sasha is a diminutive of Alexander)

.
Origin: Hails from Severomorsk, Murmansk Oblast in northwestern Russia‚Äîborn and raised in the harsh, cold expanse of the Russian tundra 

.
Not Radiant; human with a military-esque background. A key incident involved losing his right eye‚Äîreplaced with a radianite-enhanced prosthetic, affirming his status as a trusted scout 



.
Known as ‚ÄúFilin‚Äù (Russian for eagle-owl), he earned the Protocol callsign ‚ÄúSova,‚Äù meaning ‚Äúowl,‚Äù symbolizing his hunter instincts 

 Appearance

Hair: Long, bleached blonde hair, though his natural roots and eyebrows appear darker 
.
Eyes: His natural left eye is brown or blue (sources differ), while his right eye is a glowing mechanical implant 
.
Skin: Light complexion, befitting his Russian heritage .
Clothing: Wears a fur-lined coat, a dark-blue cape featuring a white symbol, leather archery gloves, owl-themed boots, a bow slung on his back, and utility gear like a shock-dart quiver and hunting knife


.
Abilities

Ability Name	Key Info
Owl Drone (C)	Deploys and pilots an owl-shaped drone to scout and tag enemies with a marking dart‚Äîexcellent for spotting enemies behind cover

.
Shock Bolt (Q)	Fires an explosive arrow; hold to increase range and alternate fire adds ricochets. Great for area denial and post-plant zones .
Recon Bolt (E)	Signature ability: fires a scouting arrow that pulses vision through walls. It can bounce off surfaces and be shot down .
Hunter‚Äôs Fury (X)	Ultimate: unleashes up to three long-range energy blasts that deal damage, pass through terrain, and mark enemies‚Äîeven enemy team members across the map .
 Summary

Sova is a stoic, Russian sniper/scout‚Äîcombining ancient archery skill with cutting-edge Radianite tech. He‚Äôs emotionally complex: dependable and trusting, yet haunted by a past mistake. His design‚Äîurban hunter aesthetic with bleached blonde hair and a mechanical eye‚Äîmirrors his role: precise, patient, and always watching.

5.content:
Personality

Cunning, cold, and surgically precise‚ÄîViper thrives on control and fear. She embraces the title ‚Äúmonster‚Äù or even ‚Äúvillain‚Äù in pursuit of her goals

.
Once a healer and altruistic chemist, her psyche was shattered by a mysterious event‚Äîwarping her into a sadistic sociopath demanding revenge 
.
Despite her ruthless reputation, she can be quietly loyal and caring toward teammates and has been known to praise impressive plays .

 Appearance (Hair, Clothing, Eyes & Ethnicity)

Hair: Jet-black, cut in a sleek lob that reinforces her calculated nature

.
Eyes: Striking venom-green irises that echo her toxin theme .
Clothing: A skin-tight green and black bodysuit, reinforced with angular shoulder armor, thigh-high boots, gloves, and a tactical toxin tank/backpack. Her face mask morphs into a full gas mask when she unleashes her ultimate 

.
Ethnicity: American (USA), most lore sources suggest she‚Äôs from Alaska, possibly with ties to Seattle‚Äôs Pacific Northwest 
.
 Background & Lore

Real name: Sabine Callas (sometimes Delilah Sabine) 
.
Age: Estimated mid-30s, with a distinguished career as a chemist (Ph.D.) prior to Protocol joining 

.
Career: Award-winning researcher and Kingdom Corporation‚Äôs Chief Scientific Officer, pioneering medicine before an unknown incident erased her old life .
Transformation: After the event devastated her, she weaponized her scientific expertise, creating toxic arms to seek vengeance and ultimately co-founded the Valorant Protocol with Brimstone .
Motivations: Her trauma fuels her relentless desire to inflict suffering‚Äîshe views herself as the judge and executioner .
üõ†Ô∏è Abilities Overview

Ability	Description
C ‚Äì Snake Bite	Fires an acid canister that shatters into a damaging toxic pool, applying Vulnerable‚Äîenemies take double damage for 2‚ÄØs

.
Q ‚Äì Poison Cloud	Deploys a static emitter that releases a hot green gas cloud on command, consuming fuel‚Äîemitter can be picked up and redeployed .
E ‚Äì Toxic Screen	Places a line of emitters; activate to raise a damaging green gas wall, using fuel for area control .
X ‚Äì Viper‚Äôs Pit	Ultimate creates a massive toxic area that severely reduces enemy vision and gradually drains their max health‚Äîlasts indefinitely while Viper stays within and refuels .
Fuel regenerates over time, providing her with lasting battlefield presence 

üîç Summary
Viper is a deeply damaged, genius chemist-turned-controller who manipulates toxins to assert dominance and mask vulnerabilities. Her precision toolkit lays toxic traps, blocks sightlines, forces enemies into lethal zones, and sets up plays with surgical control. She‚Äôs a master of slow psychological warfare‚Äîif it bleeds, she can kill it‚Ä¶ and enjoy every second.

6.content:
Cypher (Amir El Amari) is the enigmatic sentinel from Rabat, Morocco‚Äîa master spy wrapped in mystery, whose every move is calculated and shrouded in shadows.

üåê Identity & Background

Real name: Amir El‚ÄØAmari (AKA ‚ÄúPrince of the Moon‚Äù), Agent‚ÄØ05 of Valorant .
Portrayed as a Moroccan information broker, he grew up in poverty, silent on his past tragedies; he lost his wife and family, including someone named Nora
.
Wields deep resentment toward Kingdom Corporation for plundering his homeland
.
 Personality

Ultra‚Äëprivate and secretive: refuses to expose his face or share personal details‚Äîeven agents he works closely with haven‚Äôt seen his face .
Clever, mischievous, and morbidly witty: cracks dark jokes, nicknames teammates (e.g., Jett is ‚Äúwind assassin‚Äù) .
Prideful and manipulative: confident in intel-gathering and resourceful, indulges in kleptomania‚Äîborrows gadgets without asking .
Emotionally hardened: haunted by past losses, he values anonymity above all, fearing exposure most 
.
 Appearance & Ethnicity

Ethnicity: Arab/Moroccan, North African; fluent accent from the Maghreb region
.
Outfit: Signature long white trench coat with gold, brown, and blue trims; dull grey pants; black flat shoes

Headgear & mask: Wide-brimmed white hat with deployable antenna; high-tech black mask conceals face, hexagonal glowing blue lenses 
.
Gloves: Blue, with a glowing magnet on palms to draw back gadgets
valorant-lore.fandom.com
.
Physique: Tall (~180‚ÄØcm), slender yet toned; no visible skin, accentuating his secretive aura 
.
üõ†Ô∏è In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Slot	Skill	Description
C ‚Äì Trapwire	Places stealth tripwires between walls; enemies who cross get tethered, revealed, stunned‚Äîtraps are retrievable

.	
Q ‚Äì Cyber Cage	Throws remote cage that, when activated, blocks vision and emits sound if crossed .	
E ‚Äì Spycam	Deploys surveillance camera; can be accessed remotely and can shoot darts to mark enemies .	
X ‚Äì Neural Theft	Uses on an enemy corpse to reveal locations of their living teammates .	
üîç TL;DR

Cypher is Valorant‚Äôs quintessential sentinel‚ÄîMoroccan-born, cunning, and secretive. His appearance imitates a stylish spy-cowboy hybrid, always fully concealed and ready for intelligence warfare. His toolkit specializes in surveillance: tripwires, vision-blocking cages, cameras, and a game-changing intel ultimate. On defense, he controls space; on offense, he exposes enemy positions. Above all, he embodies mystery‚ÄîCypher is always watching, and never fully seen.

7.content:
Personality

A brilliant, somewhat quirky inventor‚ÄîKilljoy takes pride in her creations and loves to test them in the field 

.
She can come off as smug or overly confident (‚Äúsmartest of them all‚Äù), yet is steadfast, calm, and composed 
.
While she sometimes teases other tech‚Äëfocused agents (like Cypher), she trusts herself deeply‚Äîencouraging them to hand over gadgets for her to fix
.
Shows a compassionate side, too‚Äîshe was upset about non-military casualties in the Everett‚ÄëLinde lab incident

Part of the VALORANT roster‚Äôs first confirmed queer couple with Raze‚Äîa romantic relationship officially confirmed
.
üëÄ Appearance

Name: Klara‚ÄØB√∂hringer
Ethnicity: German; one parent of German ancestry 
.
Hair: Dark brown, medium-length, often tucked under a green beanie

.
Eyes: Brown, behind large, round black-rimmed glasses .
Clothing:
Iconic yellow padded jacket with purple ‚ÄúX‚Äù shoulder patches, blue interior 
.
Tight, slightly ripped black jeans, thigh strap with fanny-pack, black fingerless gloves, green sneakers styled like Converse .
Wears silver hoop earrings and sometimes switches her outfit (e.g. white hoodie in WARM UP cinematic) Background & Lore

Known as the ‚Äúgenius of Germany,‚Äù she became Kingdom Corporation‚Äôs R&D lead by age 18 

Created much of Valorant Protocol‚Äôs tech‚Äîincluding Brimstone‚Äôs bracer and possibly the Spike/defuser 
.
Joined the Protocol as the fourth agent, mentored by Brimstone, with a friendly rivalry with Raze .
Her inventions were sometimes misused while at Kingdom‚Äîcritics note she didn‚Äôt foresee their negative potential
.
Involved heavily in Mirror‚ÄëEarth projects (Everett‚ÄëLinde), powering tech with Chamber and Neon 
.
In a relationship with Raze, confirmed in-game via official Valorant Twitter
.
üõ†Ô∏è In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Ability	Description
Alarmbot (Q)	Deploys a bot that hunts enemies in range and applies Vulnerable, making them take more damage
.
Nanoswarm (C)	Throwable grenade that conceals a swarming nanobot patch, activated to damage enemies over time .
Turret (E)	Stationary auto-turret firing in a 180¬∞ arc for intel and chip damage .
Lockdown (X)	Ultimate device that, after 13-second windup, Detains all enemies in a large radius unless destroyed .
She‚Äôs a Sentinel‚Äîideal for anchoring sites and area control
.
Combo: Alarmbot ‚Üí Nanoswarm is a classic trap setup. Turret provides constant intel; Lockdown resets rounds and swings late-game fights.
‚úÖ Summary

Personality: Confident, ingenious, playful‚Äîbut serious when it counts; caring beneath the tech.
Look: German tinkerer aesthetic‚Äîbright jacket, green beanie, glasses, and tech-centric gear.
Lore: Inventor prodigy turned Protocol Sentinel; involved in key tech development and Mirror-Earth missions; in a canon queer relationship with Raze.
Abilities: Tech-savvy arsenal built for traps, zoning, area denial, and locking down enemies with her ultimate.

8.content:
Identity & Ethnicity
Real name: Zyanya Mondrag√≥n
Nationality: Mexican (from central Mexico, possibly San Miguel de Allende or Guanajuato) 

Radiant by nature: She‚Äôs a Radiant, meaning she gained supernatural powers from Radianite 

üòà Personality
Fierce and ruthless: Reyna is savage and animalistic‚Äîshe takes what she wants in battle, showing no mercy 
.
Anti-technology: Deep distrust for tech and those who rely on it, stemming from a traumatic event caused by machines
.
Protective of family: She‚Äôs driven by her love for her sister Lucia and will spill blood to save her 
.
Competitive Radiant pride: Sees Radiants as the future, competing with her peers to assert dominance 
.
üëÅÔ∏è Appearance (Hair, Clothing, Eyes, Tattoos)
Hair: Long dark hair with purple-dyed ends 
.
Eyes: Sharp, glowing purple eyes that intensify when her powers are active
.
Outfit: A form-fitting purple-and-black bodysuit‚Äîsleeveless on one arm‚Äîdesigned for agility and intimidation .
Armor & accessories: Fingerless gloves, studded combat boots, belts and straps, and hoop earrings .
Tattoos & radiant glow: Intricate glowing tattoos from her right shoulder to palm, and a purple glow over her heart and chest. When using her ultimate, the glow spreads across her body 
.
Background & Motivation
Tragic past: Suffered a catastrophic event involving machines; distrust for technology born from pain 
.
Sanctuary leader: Founded a refuge for other Radiants to escape tech oppression and heal 
.
Sister‚Äôs condition: Partnered with scientists (and Viper) to siphon her soul energy into Lucia to keep her alive‚Äîthough the process remains unstable
.
Valiant but volatile: Recruited by Valorant Protocol as Agent‚ÄØ11; her volatile and tech-hating beliefs worry some peers
.
In‚ÄëGame Abilities
Ability	Description
Passive ‚Äì Soul Harvest	Enemies she kills drop ephemeral Soul Orbs that last ~3 seconds
.
C ‚Äì Leer	Throws a destructible ethereal eye that blinds enemies who view it (to her team, not herself); it can travel through terrain .
Q ‚Äì Devour	Consume an orb to heal rapidly (up to overhealing) for a short time .
E ‚Äì Dismiss	Consume an orb to become intangible (and invisible during Empress) for quick escapes .
X ‚Äì Empress	Frenzy mode: boosts fire rate, reload/equip speed, infinite orb uses, invisibility on Dismiss, and refreshes the effect on each kill .

 Quick Summary
Reyna is a high-risk, high-reward duelist reliant on securing kills to fuel her self-sustain and escape tools. Her vampiric theme, combined with her aggressive kit and dark aesthetics, makes her a standout agent both in personality and gameplay.

9.content:
Identity & Ethnicity

Real name: Erik Torsten; catcher name "Breach" 

Origin: Sweden üá∏üá™; he's human, not Radiant or altered like some agents

 Personality

Hard-charging, thrill‚Äëseeker‚Äîcalls combat "another payday" and says ‚ÄúGuns in my face? Just another Tuesday.‚Äù
Lacks patience, jumps into fights‚Äîeven irks teammates like Sova and Yoru

Former criminal-turned‚Äëagent; he's rough around the edges, a man of action who lives for the fight
üëÄ Appearance

Height & Build: Tall (around 6‚Ä≤3‚Ä≥/200‚ÄØcm), muscular 
jannyai.com
Hair: Long reddish-brown hair tied in a ponytail or braid, with a goatee/mustache

Eyes & Facial Features: Light-colored eyes; rugged with facial hair
Prosthetic Arms: Carbon-steel, titanium-plated, bionic arms he built himself (later upgraded by Raze) 

Clothing & Gear: Wears a green tactical vest over a black shirt (with a red horned-demon icon), brown/olive pants, spike-toed boots; prominent tattoo of Thor‚Äôs hammer on his chest; symbols on arms and boots 

Background & Lore

Early Life: Born a double congenital amputee; pity during family's prosecution led to leniency 

Criminal Past: Turned to crime‚Äîinfamous, violent, mechanical arms gave him lethal edge; went into exile 

Upgraded by Raze: Met Brazilian agent Raze (Tayane Alves) who enhanced his prosthetics with radianite power

Joining VALORANT: Recruited as Agent 13; records sealed; though he works for the Protocol, his past weighs on him and he remains estranged from home
Personality in Game World: A high-risk, high-reward operator‚Äîthrives in chaos and fights‚Äîbut he can overshadow teammates with his impatience

In‚ÄëGame Abilities

Ability	Key Effects & Tips
Aftershock (C)	Fires a slow-exploding seismic charge through walls, dealing ~80‚ÄØHP per tick and dazing victims. Ideal for clearing close spaces like closets or hallways 
.
Flashpoint (Q)	Sends a fast-acting flashbang through terrain. Excels in forcing enemies out of cover‚Äîbut can also blind teammates if misused .
Fault Line (E)	Signature ability. Hold and release to send a quake through walls that stuns anyone in its line of effect. Great for initiating team pushes or delaying enemies .
Rolling Thunder (X)	Ultimate‚Äîa massive seismic charge that knocks up and dazes enemies in a large cone through terrain. Perfect for clearing sites or initiating post-plant retakes .

 Role & Playstyle

A hard-initiation specialist: Breach‚Äôs toolkit is designed to blast walls, blind foes, and shake up entrenched positions‚Äîideal for coordinated team pushes
Effective in corridors, chokepoints, and retakes; requires good comms and timing to maximize ability synergy 

Can be overwhelming for less experienced players‚Äîhis abilities need precision and team coordination

10.content:
Personality

Bold, sarcastic, and cheeky‚ÄîJett often boasts and taunts opponents. She‚Äôs youthful and energetic, but values teamwork despite her lone-wolf tendencies 
.
She has a cocky ‚Äúin‚Äëyour‚Äëface‚Äù attitude but is friends with teammates like Sage and Phoenix .
Fluent in English despite South Korean origin; her voice actor‚Äôs bilingual background may explain this balance
.
üëÄ Appearance & Ethnicity

Name: Han Sunwoo (Sunwoo Han); she‚Äôs South Korean, born in Seoul
.
Physique: Young adult, fair-skinned, among the shorter agents (‚âà5‚Ä≤5‚Ä≥‚Äì5‚Ä≤6‚Ä≥) .
Hair & Face: White/silver hair in a messy bun, long bangs, blue eyes with eyeliner
.
Outfit & Details: Sports a blue sleeveless jacket/crop top, black baggy pants, gloves, wind-logo armor, kunai, and wind-marked bracers. Scar below her left shoulder from an earlier timeline fight 

 Background & Lore

Born in Seoul, worked as a chef, then awakened as a Radiant with wind manipulation.
Experienced a destructive ‚Äúfreak storm‚Äù at her restaurant and fled; later, confusion with her Omega Earth counterpart caused widespread incidents, even in Venice
.
Joined the VALORANT Protocol as Agent‚ÄØ10, embodying her agile and evasive style 
.
Radiant hero with personal stakes in dimensional chaos‚Äîthe confusion with her mirror self still haunts her reputation .

 Abilities Overview

Ability	Description
Passive ‚Äì Drift	Hold jump to glide gently, aiding precision landings or avoiding falls 

C ‚Äì Cloudburst	Throw and curve small smoke clouds to block vision or cover retreats .
Q ‚Äì Updraft	Launch upward to reach high ground and surprise enemies .
E ‚Äì Tailwind	Dash in current movement direction after activation; high-risk escape/playmaker skill, with charge resets on two kills .
X ‚Äì Blade Storm	Equip deadly throwing knives; headshot kills restore daggers. Accurate even while airborne .
TL;DR

A spirited, cocky South Korean Radiant with wind powers, Jett is Valorant‚Äôs ultimate agile duelist. Her slick, evasive playstyle‚Äîcombining drift-glides, vertical mobility, rebounds, and razor-sharp daggers‚Äîmakes her ideal for aggression and highlight moments.
